{"code":1,"isDone":false,"toInsertArticleList":[{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"When is Rochelle Humes’ baby due?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12496070/when-rochelle-humes-baby-due/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>ROCHELLE Humes and her husband Marvin are getting ready to welcome an addition to their ever growing brood.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The happy couple have revealed <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11382335/rochelle-humes-baby-three-marvin-humes/\">they are set to have another baby</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496292\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/67fc018d-f769-4e7e-a8ef-9b29d4c7eb46.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496292\" width=\"960\" height=\"751\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>Rochelle Humes is having another baby[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>When is Rochelle Humes&#8217; baby due?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/rochelle-humes/\">Rochelle</a> hasn&#8217;t got long until her baby is born.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Although we don&#8217;t have an exact date, we do know the child is due in October, 2020.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>We also know <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11449152/rochelle-humes-baby-bump-expecting-a-boy/\">she is having a boy</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>This will be her and husband <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/marvin-humes/\">Marvin&#8217;s</a> first son.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496286\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 815px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000593946316.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=805\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496286\" width=\"805\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Rochelle shows off her growing baby bump[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>When did Rochelle and Marvin Humes announce her pregnancy?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Rochelle and Marvin revealed in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11382335/rochelle-humes-baby-three-marvin-humes/\">March that they were expecting another baby</a>, telling followers: &#8220;There&#8217;s a baby bunny in my oven.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Rochelle posted a shot of their ultrasound scan on Easter Sunday alongside a pair of knitted boots and a board that read: &#8220;We&#8217;re eggspecting. Baby Humes. October 2020.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Marvin posted the same picture, writing: &#8220;And there&#8217;s another Bunny in the oven! Baby Humes due Oct 2020 <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/2764.png\" alt=\"❤\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" />our hearts are so full we are truly blessed <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f64f-1f3fd.png\" alt=\"🙏🏽\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" />.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496290\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 843px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603625056.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=833\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496290\" width=\"833\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Rochelle and her husband Marvin are expanding their brood[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>When did Rochelle and Marvin Humes get married?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Rochelle and Marvin began dating in&#160;March 2010 and&#160;moved in together three months later.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Marvin proposed to Rochelle on the Caribbean island of Antigua on New Year&#8217;s Eve in 2011.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The couple then&#160;married in a lavish ceremony at Blenheim Palace in 2012.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Marvin rose to fame with boyband JLS alongside bandmates&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/3315266/aston-merrygold-strictly-come-dancing-jls-star-baby-fiancee-sarah-lou-richards/\">Aston Merrygold</a>,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/2375787/oritse-williams-x-factor-singer-rape-charge-rochelle-humes/\">Oritsé Williams</a>, and&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/2739122/jb-gill-jls-songs-of-praise-wife-chloe/\">JB Gill</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<h2>How many other children do Rochelle and Marvin Humes have?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>The couple already have two daughters, Alaia-Mai (born May 20, 2013) and&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/3060128/rochelle-humes-birth-baby-girl-marvin/\">Valentina Raine</a>&#160;(born March 10, 2017).</p>\n\n\n\n<p>After&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/3060765/meet-valentina-raine-humes-rochelle-and-marvin-humes-reveal-name-of-baby-girl/\">the birth of Valentina</a>, Rochelle announced that she would be trying the latest health fad of eating her&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/3094919/this-morning-viewers-disgusted-by-afterbirth-art-similar-to-rochelle-humes-which-sees-umbilical-cord-made-into-necklaces-and-dream-catchers/\">placenta in pill form</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She also had <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/3072457/rochelle-humes-frames-her-dehyrdated-umbilical-cord-and-reveals-she-will-take-placenta-pills-after-giving-birth-to-second-child/\">the umbilical cord shaped into the word &#8220;love&#8221; and framed.</a></p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 15:57:54 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/67fc018d-f769-4e7e-a8ef-9b29d4c7eb46.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"7e21be3ba762f6dd5c1eea8e6088d1ca","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn39@2020_3/2020/08/25/16-46-58-195_df2c6a02c594b460.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":751,"sourceBytes":133522,"destBytes":133522,"author":"Joanne Kavanagh","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/67fc018d-f769-4e7e-a8ef-9b29d4c7eb46.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn39@2020_3/2020/08/25/16-46-58-195_df2c6a02c594b460.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000593946316.jpg?strip=all&w=805":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn22@2020_2/2020/08/25/16-47-02-769_9baf4191e2e29f56.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/2764.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn51@2020_2/2020/08/25/16-47-11-869_cea6e44c55252c2e.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f64f-1f3fd.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn60@2020_2/2020/08/25/16-47-08-069_9f4faad698ac5ae8.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603625056.jpg?strip=all&w=833":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn28@2020_1/2020/08/25/16-47-14-406_a157e0df7bc0f2b4.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016663},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Love Island’s Iain Stirling jokes that he’s going into the villa as he shares photo of lookalike US islander","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12491372/love-island-iain-stirling-villa-lookalike-us-islander/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n<p>&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>LOVE Island&#8217;s Iain Stirling has joked that he is heading to the villa after discovering his US lookalike islander.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Scottish comedian, who shot to fame doing the show&#8217;s voiceover, shared a hilarious response after spotting a striking resemblance to new contestant James McCool.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12493080\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 787px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/e6f59dda-0205-43ab-a49b-f480bbf63cb7.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=777\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12493080\" width=\"777\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>Iain Stirling joked that he is heading to the Love Island villa after finding his US lookalike[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The funnyman joked that he would be going on this year’s show as a contestant instead of doing the voiceover, despite being engaged to Laura Whitmore.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Alongside a snap of hunky James, he wrote: “Latest #LoveIslandUSA&#160;update.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“For those asking I will not be voicing the American Love Island. But I will be going into the villa!!!”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Fans were quick to respond agreeing that the star shared an uncanny resemblance to the show&#8217;s newest singleton.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12493113\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 588px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/61ff03e1-0667-4f25-b808-2a1e08c3ae4e.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=578\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12493113\" width=\"578\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>The Scottish comedian believes he has an uncanny resemblance to US contestant James McCool[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>One wrote: “Uncanny” with a string of laughing faces.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Another wrote: “&#8221;Minus the six pack.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A third wrote: “That’ll be something to see!! Miss your voiceover Iain!”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>One Twitter fan also hoped that the Scotsman would be narrating the US series, they wrote: “We wish you were voicing it! Definitely miss you on our version.”</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12493154\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 611px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/39984c3e-5d72-41b1-a571-6c21abc52054.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=601\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12493154\" width=\"601\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty - Contributor</figcredit></figure>Fans were quick to respond agreeing that the Scotman looked similar to the US hunk[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The second series of Love Island USA will be coming to our screens next month filmed in a Covid-secure hotel in Las Vegas.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>UK fans will be able to tune in from September 7, with the first episode airing at 9pm on ITV2.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Contestants will be kept in a safe “bubble” inside a stunning villa on top of Caesars Entertainment’s boutique hotel, The Cromwell.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Host Arielle Vandenberg and narrator Matthew Hoffman will return to oversee the battle to win the $50k cash prize.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492960\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603818270-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492960\" width=\"960\" height=\"480\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>ITV</figcredit></figure>Love Island USA will be coming to our screens next month filmed in a COVID-secure hotel in Las Vegas.[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Paul Mortimer,&#160;ITV’s Head of Digital Channels and Acquisitions&#160;said: “We’re thrilled that ITV2 can bring the latest US version of&#160;Love Island&#160;to viewers this year.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Las Vegas may seem like an odd destination for the show but the canny producers have beaten Covid with a show that adheres to all production protocols and that could well be sensational.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Certainly the ‘villa’ is impressive and the cast diverse and amazing. We believe<em><strong>&#160;</strong></em>Love Island&#160;fans will embrace this Sin City twist, my bet is the series will be another big hit.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The show kicks off today in the States with a starting line-up of five girls and six boys.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492980\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000553594885.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492980\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Fans have missed watching Iain and Laura on their screens after the UK version was cancelled amid coronavirus[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The US series was previously filmed in a villa in Fiji, but production has been switched to Las Vegas due to coronavirus travel restrictions.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And while British fans last year had to stay up late to tune in, this year ITV2 have switched it to prime time, making up for the fact that this summer&#8217;s UK version had to be cancelled.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But some Love Island fans have been left underwhelmed by the “lack of diversity” in the new American series.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>One Twitter user said: “You can’t cast black women to just claim you’re diverse. You need to work on the casting process.”</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492984\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 778px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000509683214.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=768\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492984\" width=\"768\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Love Island UK will return &#8220;bigger and better&#8221; than ever with an &#8220;extended run&#8221; in summer 2021[/caption]\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>Another said: “Love Island already got me upset with the selection of girls, one black girl that’s all we get.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Love Island UK was set to have its famous summer series this year, but it had to be cancelled due to the pandemic and will not air until summer 2021.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Show bosses felt it would be &#8220;impossible to safeguard&#8221; those involved with series.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A source said: “ITV want Love Island to be a huge success so have decided to put all their energy into making next summer’s series a bumper run, and not trying to force a Winter version given the uncertainty in the television industry still at this point.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“January 2021 seems a long way off but the process would be starting imminently and with certain restrictions still in place they don’t want to approach anything half-baked.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>An ITV spokesman said: &#8220;Love Island UK will return bigger and better than ever with an extended run in summer 2021.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\">\n\t\t\t\t<div 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Arsenal new boy Dinzeyi mirrored Sol Campbell’s transfer from rivals Spurs… now he wants to copy Saka and Nketiah","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12496190/arsenal-transfer-dinzeyi-tottenham-campbell/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>JONATHAN DINZEYI copied Sol Campbell&#8217;s move from Tottenham to fierce rivals Arsenal &#8211; and now he wants to follow in the footsteps of Bukayo Saka and Eddie Nketiah.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The 20-year-old defender made the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12430338/arsenal-jon-dinzeyi-tottenham-akinola/\">shock move across North London on a free transfer last week</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496502\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 769px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/4b0c43dc-dd73-4e12-a69b-5d9a63c5f40f.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=759\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496502\" width=\"759\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Jonathan Dinzeyi moved from Tottenham to Arsenal in search of first-team football[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Despite risking the wrath of Spurs fans, Dinzeyi can&#8217;t wait to get started at <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1196653/arsenal/\">Arsenal</a> and become the latest youngster to be given a crack at first-team action.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Dinzeyi claimed the chance to work with Gunners legend Steve Bould was a deciding factor.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The young defender said: &#8220;Knowing that Steve Bould is the head coach was a big factor for me.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;He&#8217;s a legend at the club and he&#8217;s played in my position.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I&#8217;m really hoping I can learn from him to develop my game.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<h3><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12116744/arsenal-transfer-news-live-willian-aubameyang-partey/\"><strong>ARSENAL NEWS LIVE: Click here for the latest Gunners news</strong></a></h3>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<p>&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Dinzeyi also revealed he has been inspired to join Arsenal thanks to a procession of youngsters getting first-team action in recent seasons.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He continued: &#8220;Seeing the likes of [Reiss] Nelson, Saka, Nketiah and [Joe] Willock getting chances was a big thing for me too.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;That was another reason why I wanted to come here.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I believe if you train hard then you&#8217;ll play well and the manager will give you the opportunity for you to show what you&#8217;re about.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I&#8217;m really glad I&#8217;ve been given this opportunity.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Dinzeyi even confessed to being a childhood Arsenal fan &#8211; rather than former club <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1196652/tottenham-hotspur/\">Tottenham</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/AD-SPORT-GRAPHIC-Arsenal-Top-Fixtures-2.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/AD-SPORT-GRAPHIC-Arsenal-Top-Fixtures-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12451000\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /></a>\n\n\n\n<div class=\"wp-block-group\"><div class=\"wp-block-group__inner-container\">\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<h2><a -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>He claimed: &#8220;It&#8217;s a great feeling [to join]. Arsenal are a massive club and they were actually the first club I supported as a child.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;They have a great history and with the new manager coming in who likes to play a lot of young players.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I think it&#8217;s a great opportunity for me to show the fans and the coaching staff what I&#8217;m about.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I&#8217;m really excited to get started now.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; The Only Way Is Essex season 26 return date, cast and spoilers","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/12370074/towie-season-26-return-date-cast-spoilers/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>TOWIE fanatics have been left without their fix of Essex drama this year.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>However, this is set to change as it has been announced that the 10th-anniversary-series will be airing in autumn 2020.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12371011\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000601332229.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12371011\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Lime Pictures</figcredit></figure>Fans are desperate to see what the new series of Towie holds[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>When does the new season of Towie start?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/11797131/towie-return-autumn-tenth-anniversary/\">The 10th-anniversary series </a>was due to start in March 2020, but ITV bosses decided to delay production on the new series until later in the year.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The new series is expected to air in September &#8211; but no exact start date has been announced just yet.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Although the delay may come as a disappointment, Towie fans will be delighted to hear that the show will be airing twice a week like it used to.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A source said: “There have been lengthy discussions with the cast, and it just wouldn’t have worked without a busy social scene and going to clubs and their shops.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12371023\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000517397761.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12371023\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>ITV</figcredit></figure>Series 25 was filled with typical Essex drama[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>“So bosses have decided to wait until later in the year when the crisis has calmed down a bit. It’s not worth the risk.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Head of Unscripted for Lime Pictures Sarah Tyekiff told us: “We are so excited to get the iconic Towie back on people’s screens, twice a week, for what is going to be a huge Anniversary season.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;It’ll be back with a bang to celebrate 10 phenomenal years with our amazing cast and see the return of some very familiar faces.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>18 new episodes will arrive on TV screens later this year.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12370615\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000477081511.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12370615\" width=\"960\" height=\"529\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>ITV</figcredit></figure>Stars from earlier series will make an appearance in the new season[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>Who will be in the cast?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Fans will be excited to hear that old <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/the-only-way-is-essex/\">Towie </a>favourites <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/james-argent/\">James Argent</a>, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/lauren-goodger/\">Lauren Goodger</a> and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/amy-childs/\">Amy Childs</a> have all said they want to be part of the tenth anniversary celebrations.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>TOWIE legends <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/joey-essex/\">Joey Essex</a> and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/danielle-armstrong/\">Danielle Armstrong </a>have also been spotted back on set after quitting the show six years ago.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>However, series 25 cast members <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/8651230/chloe-ross-towie-2019-friends-georgia-kousoulou/\">Chloe Ross</a>, 26, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/10204993/towie-joey-turner-essex-mansion-house/\">Joey Turner, 18,</a>&#160;and Jayden Beales, 21, have been <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/10804516/towie-axe-chloe-ross-joey-jayden/\">given the boot </a>for the new series. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The group reunited at a festival-themed gathering for upcoming Towie episodes</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The stars were spotted filming the socially distanced episodes with full festival works, bunting, hay stacks, an ice cream van, and games set up around a field.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12370735\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 888px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000568213630.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=878\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12370735\" width=\"878\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Handout</figcredit></figure>Amy Childs has confessed she wants to return for the next series[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>What will happen in season 26?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Series 25 saw more drama than ever in Essex so the 10th anniversary series looks promising.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In the last series, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/dan-edgar/\">Dan Edgar</a> and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/amber-turner/\">Amber Turner</a> bailed on <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/chloe-sims/\">Chloe Sims</a>&#8216; birthday causing even more agg between the trio.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Meanwhile, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/olivia-attwood/\">Olivia Attwood</a> was caught up in &#8220;olive-gate&#8221; and clashed with the girls, while Harry Lee finally asked <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/9791184/frankie-sims-sister-chloe-demi-towie/\">Frankie Sims</a> to be his girlfriend.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Ella Rae Wise and Chloe Brockett were spotted having a <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12329040/towies-ella-chloe-screaming-row-new-series-fight/\">heated argument during filming for the&#160;show</a>, so we can expect rivalry between the two to continue into the last season.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>However, although Towie films abroad at least once a year, plans for a trip overseas have been axed.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12370987\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000484260815.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12370987\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>ITV</figcredit></figure>Olivia Attwood was caught up in ‘olive-gate’ last season[/caption]\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/the-only-way-is-essex/\">The ITVBe series</a>&#160;was due to start filming in the Canary Islands for the show&#8217;s annual special abroad but producers have had to scrap the plans after the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/coronavirus/\">coronavirus </a>outbreak.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Paul Mortimer, Head of Digital Channels and Acquisitions for ITV, said &#8220;After 10 years, Towie is still going strong and remains the number one show on ITVBe.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;We&#8217;re thrilled to be welcoming back new and old faces for the upcoming mega-series as the show celebrates this special anniversary.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\">\n\t\t\t\t<div style=\"padding-top: 56%; \">\n\t\t\t\t\t<video\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tdata-video-id=\"6175797274001\" 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Mom ‘slits four-year-old daughter’s throat, throws body in trash can’ and says she ‘saved her from worse fate’","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12496101/mom-slit-daughters-throat-body-trash-can/","description":"<p>A MOM &#8220;slit her four-year-old daughter&#8217;s throat and threw her body into a trash can&#8221; and said that she &#8220;saved her from a worse fate,&#8221; according to police.</p>\n<p>Krystal Lewandowski, 34, has been charged with <a href=\"http://the-sun.com/topic/crime\">capital murder</a> after she called the cops on Monday to report that her daughter was missing, according to an arrest affidavit obtained by <a href=\"https://www.fox4news.com/news/fort-worth-mom-accused-of-slashing-4-year-old-daughters-throat-dumping-body-in-trash\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">KDFW</a>.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12496099\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 442px\"><img width=\"432\" height=\"429\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Fort Worth Texas Police Department</figcredit></figure>Krystal Lewandowski, 34, was charged with capital murder[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12496100\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604049538.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496100\" width=\"960\" height=\"709\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>The incident took place on Monday in Texas[/caption]</p>\n<p>Lewandowski told 911 at around 11.35am that she last saw her daughter in the backyard of her <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/where/texas/\">Texas</a> home.</p>\n<p>According to the arrest affidavit, as the conversation continued, the mother allegedly said: &#8220;OK, maybe I should just tell you now. OK, so last night I was advised to slit her throat.&#8221;</p>\n<p>She also admitted to wrapping up her body and putting her in a trash can in the backyard the night before.</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t</p>\n<p>When <a href=\"http://the-sun.com/topic/police\">police</a> later arrived at the scene they found her daughter&#8217;s body in a trash can in the backyard.</p>\n<p>However, Lewandowski told investigators that she had &#8220;saved&#8221; her daughter and prevented worse from happening to her, the outlet reported.</p>\n<p>Lewandowski is being held on a bond of <a href=\"http://the-sun.com/topic/money-us\">$750,000</a>. </p>\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 15:17:49 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604049398.jpg?strip=all&w=432","linkMd5":"063395e1754cfc3b64a4014755809d36","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn23@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-46-57-006_835ee67122bb661f.webp","destWidth":432,"destHeight":429,"sourceBytes":81046,"destBytes":81046,"author":"Mollie Mansfield","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604049398.jpg?strip=all&w=432":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn23@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-46-57-006_835ee67122bb661f.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604049538.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn16@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-47-01-031_bbf145238e3d3f10.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016700},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Delay to start of Kickstart scheme as recruiters told not to post listings leaving thousands of job hunters waiting","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12495782/kickstart-scheme-delay/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>THOUSANDS of job hunters applying for the government&#8217;s flagship scheme to help young workers have been left in limbo as employers are told to pull ads. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>In July Chancellor Rishi Sunak announced the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12062343/kickstart-jobs-scheme-how-work/\">£2billion Kickstart scheme</a>, aimed at getting hundreds of thousands of unemployed 16-24-year-olds into work.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496278\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/74f766b9-2695-4f06-bc7d-7ea36bdf599a.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496278\" width=\"960\" height=\"612\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>The DWP have urged recruiters to hold off on advertising jobs under the scheme [/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Under the scheme the government will subsidise the wage costs for young people claiming <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/universal-credit/\">Universal Credit</a> who are hired by employers for six-month work placements.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Employers should have been able to apply for the scheme this month but now some have been told to stop advertising jobs until a start date is confirmed. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Some recruitment sites say they have removed adverts and slam the government for not giving employers a date for when they can apply, reports <a href=\"https://www.thisismoney.co.uk/money/smallbusiness/article-8652295/Kickstart-Scheme-Recruiters-remove-job-listings.html\">This is Money</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Charlie Johnson, CEO of graduate recruitment firm <a href=\"https://brighterbox.com/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Brighter Box</a>, told the Sun they&#8217;ve been inundated with requests from job applicants.  </p>\n\n\n\n<p>He said: “We wrote a quick overview of what we knew about the scheme for our website and were subsequently inundated with loads of requests for further information.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“I’ve spoken with several employers who are hoping to take advantage of the scheme – some of whom are looking to hire tens of sales people on a 25 hour per week basis (i.e. the amount that the government will be funding these positions). &#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“But we haven’t run with any of the twenty or so requests we’ve had so far to advertise roles as companies are awaiting further news&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Kickstart was announced as part of an emergency package to try and limit the unemployment caused by the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/coronavirus/\">Covid-19 pandemic</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Resolution Foundation has forecast the scheme will help find jobs for around 350,000 youngsters in that age group.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A DWP spokesperson said: “It’s fantastic that so many employers, like Tesco, already want to sign up to our £2 billion Kickstart scheme, and we’ll be publishing further details on how they can shortly.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“Until then, we urge employers to be patient and to not start advertising roles they want to be covered by the scheme just yet – there’s no cap on Kickstart places available, so no-one will miss out.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Dire forecasts from experts have predicted <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12017871/youth-unemployment-record-high-one-million/\">more than a million youngsters will be out of work</a> this year.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Think-tank the Institute for Public Policy Research said 410,000 18 to 24-year-olds were already jobless.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And it forecast 620,000 more would be out of work in the next six months.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Meanwhile, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12117089/unemployment-treble-hitting-3million-gdp-fall-obr/\">unemployment as a whole could treble to reach three million</a>, the Office for Budget Responsibility (OBR) has predicted.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The predicted 1.03million total would be the highest since comparable records began in 1992.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The scheme will cover 100 per cent of the minimum wage for a maximum of 25 hours a week — with firms able to top up wages.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>For example, young people between 21 and 24 years old on minimum wage currently earn £8.20 an hour, working out as £205 for 25 hours.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-money\" data-slide-count=\"4\" Money</h3>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-pagination theme__swiper-pagination\"></div>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div taking part in Eat Out to Help Out as the scheme draws to an end\t\t\t</span>\n\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail__item-content -->\n\t<div class=\"rail__item-gradient-light\">\n\n\t</div>\n\t<a -->\n\t</div><!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index-->\n\t</div> <!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>It comes as the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12059474/billion-kickstart-scheme-support-wages-young-people/\">warned that the unemployment rate could reach 15 per cent</a> if a second virus wave hits.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Roughly 9.3million workers in the UK <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12042474/half-businesses-furloughed-workers-cut-staff-scheme-ends/\">have been furloughed</a> due to the pandemic.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Check out our guide on how to Sun","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/74f766b9-2695-4f06-bc7d-7ea36bdf599a.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn80@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-46-58-236_d928bf5d0e502cf7.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016653},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"I spent £2.5k & 4 years turning my boring beige rental home my own multicoloured paradise","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/11868665/boring-beige-rental-home-multicoloured-paradise/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>A MUM has spent four years and £2,500 transforming her boring beige rental property into a colourful masterpiece &#8211; even though she&#8217;ll have to whitewash it when she moves house.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Rachael Havenhand, 28, from Todwick, Sheffield, spends around seven hours-a-week adding to her multicoloured home &#8211; but dedicates much longer when she has a project on the go.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876821\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589693997.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876821\" width=\"720\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Mum-of-two Rachael Haven Hand, pictured with daughters Florence, five, and Gabriella, nine</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876825\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694145.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876825\" width=\"720\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">It took Rachael a week of non-stop work to transform her kitchen &#8211; painting everything from the fridge to the cupboards and floor</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876839\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694404.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876839\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">For the past four years, the mum has been painting every inch of their rental home in bright colours</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>The single mum-of-two, to Gabriella, nine, and Florence, five, moved into the three-bed rental property six years ago &#8211; and tried to be &#8220;normal&#8221; with cream and grey decor for the first two years.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But since then, she&#8217;s started painting every inch of the property &#8211; including the walls, floors and furniture &#8211; and she&#8217;s far from done yet.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><em><strong>Speaking exclusively to Fabulous, the aspiring interior designer reveals all&#8230;</strong></em></p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;When I first moved into this house with my daughters&#8217; dad six years ago, it was beautiful but very beige. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876866\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694154.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876866\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Her bed and the sofa are the only things she had bought new &#8211; everything else was given to her by friends, from eBay or from Facebook Marketplace</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11877090\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 825px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/2c92a28b-50b5-4763-8ef2-bc82656d22d5.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=815\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11877090\" width=\"815\" height=\"683\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Pictured before, the house had &#8216;boring&#8217; beige colours</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876881\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694268.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876881\" width=\"960\" height=\"720\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Now it is an extension of Rachael&#8217;s personality</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>The people who lived here before us had brown and cream furniture. But it was a ready made house and, for the first couple of years, I tried to be normal.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>I’d shop online, go to The Range or IKEA and get things in gold, silver, grey and cream. I put up grey wallpaper too.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Then the colours just started seeping out of me. I thought ‘bugger this, I’m not normal, this isn’t my house the way it is’.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>I wanted to bring some colour into my home, bit by bit. </p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t<blockquote class=\"article__quote\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article__quote-copy theme__before-color theme__after-color\">\n\t\t\t<p>The colours just started seeping out of me. I thought ‘bugger this, I’m not normal, this isn’t my house the way it is’</p>\n\t\t\t\t<cite class=\"article__quote-credit theme__copy-color\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"quote-credit\">Rachael Haven Hand</span><span class=\"quote-credit-meta\">28</span>\t\t\t\t</cite>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t</blockquote>\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>So four years ago, I started painting the furniture, then I took the wallpaper off and painted the walls pink. I&#8217;ve been adding to it ever since.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>I’m always looking around and thinking ‘what can I do next?’ or ‘I’m bored of that’. I have to reign myself in, because I&#8217;d change everything every day if I had the time.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Before, I was a bit worried about what my landlord would think. She’s been over a couple of times, she looks around and says ‘umm OK then’. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>But as long as when I leave it’s all back to neutrals, she says that’s absolutely fine.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11877249\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694227-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11877249\" width=\"720\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rachael Haven Hand</figcredit></figure>Rachael&#8217;s daughters love their eclectic home[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876872\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/51543e17-0b85-4a33-83d9-74a53698edda.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876872\" width=\"960\" height=\"673\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The walls were all cream before the family moved in</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876907\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 728px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694152.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=718\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876907\" width=\"718\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">When they move, Rachael will have to strip all the colour and paint the place white again</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>When I move, I’ll literally whitewash the whole house. I’ll have to strip it all back and paint it cream or beige. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>There will be some satisfaction in painting it all white. It will be sad to do, it will break my heart and I&#8217;ll probably cry.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But to know the next place is a blank canvas to start again will really motivate me to get it done. </p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t<blockquote class=\"article__quote\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article__quote-copy theme__before-color theme__after-color\">\n\t\t\t<p>When I move, I’ll literally whitewash the whole house. I’ll have to strip it all back and paint it cream or beige</p>\n\t\t\t\t<cite class=\"article__quote-credit theme__copy-color\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"quote-credit\">Rachael Havenhand</span><span class=\"quote-credit-meta\">28</span>\t\t\t\t</cite>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t</blockquote>\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>It will take me a couple of weeks, I&#8217;ve got murals on some walls which will need sanding down, but I reckon I could whitewash a room every day.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>I&#8217;ll need to lay a new lino down on my kitchen floor too, because I painted that in a neon pink and turquoise green eighties print.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It makes me really happy to have a bright house. If the girls are at their dad&#8217;s, I try to watch my soaps but I always get distracted.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>I have to rewind the TV all the time because I&#8217;m just looking around my house, thinking about what I could do next.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876980\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694288.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876980\" width=\"720\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Rachael also makes her own prints and sells them on Etsy</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876946\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694151-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876946\" width=\"720\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Rachael dreams of working as an interior designer one day</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876990\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694369.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876990\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">She gets old furniture, sands it down and paints it in her signature style</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11877009\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 778px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589693939.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=768\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11877009\" width=\"768\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Rachael says she paints every day, for at least an hour</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>My house makes other people happy too. I&#8217;ve had some comments from strangers, saying &#8216;oh I couldn&#8217;t do that&#8217; and at first I&#8217;d take it personally. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>If I put a picture on an interior group on Facebook, I’ll get strangers saying ‘can you imagine the headache living in here?’ or ‘it would give you a migraine’. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>But I just laugh it off. I think most people appreciate what I’ve done, even if they couldn’t live with it themselves. It’s very rare I get a negative comment like that.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t<blockquote class=\"article__quote\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article__quote-copy theme__before-color theme__after-color\">\n\t\t\t<p>I get strangers saying ‘can you imagine the headache living in here?’ or ‘it would give you a migraine’. I just laugh it off</p>\n\t\t\t\t<cite class=\"article__quote-credit theme__copy-color\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"quote-credit\">Rachael Havenhand</span><span class=\"quote-credit-meta\">28</span>\t\t\t\t</cite>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t</blockquote>\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>If someone&#8217;s being deliberately nasty, I just ignore them. It makes me and my daughters happy, and that’s all that matters. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Without my house, I wouldn’t have the following I have on Instagram. I have 25,000 followers, and I get paid work from that.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>I also work as a fitness trainer and have my own <a aria-label=\"Etsy shop selling prints (opens in a new tab)\" href=\"https://www.etsy.com/shop/havenhanddesigns/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\">Etsy shop selling prints</a> &#8211; and I&#8217;m part way through an interior design diploma.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876977\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694279.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876977\" width=\"960\" height=\"720\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Rachael says she&#8217;s &#8216;constantly changing&#8217; her daughters&#8217; bedroom</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876970\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694483.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876970\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">It&#8217;s now a multicoloured masterpiece &#8211; like the rest of the house</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11877010\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 778px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589693941.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=768\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11877010\" width=\"768\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The main colour palette in the home is pink</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>When people come into my house for the first time, it blows them away. They say ‘oh my God this is so different, I would never dare do this’. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>It comes out of me naturally, being able to put colours together and use them in that way. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>A lot of people are scared of colour, so when they come here it really does take their breath away.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The girls love it, although they think I&#8217;m absolutely crackers and probably get a bit irritated where I&#8217;m constantly changing things, especially in their bedrooms. </p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t<blockquote class=\"article__quote\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article__quote-copy theme__before-color theme__after-color\">\n\t\t\t<p>It wasn&#8217;t to my ex&#8217;s taste at all &#8211; we did argue about it a couple of times</p>\n\t\t\t\t<cite class=\"article__quote-credit theme__copy-color\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"quote-credit\">Rachael Havenhand</span><span class=\"quote-credit-meta\">28</span>\t\t\t\t</cite>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t</blockquote>\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>It wasn’t to my ex’s taste at all; he lives in a beige flat now we&#8217;ve split, with black furniture. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>My house is like the inside of my brain so it suits me down to the ground. But my girls’ dad is very different, he likes his surroundings to be simple. He’s gone back to his greys, white and black now, he calls that ‘normal’.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>We did argue about all the painting a couple of times. He let me get on with it and have full creative reign, but when I was painting around him it would frustrate him.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He was quite happy to move out in the end.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876953\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694481.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876953\" width=\"960\" height=\"645\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The kitchen pictured before Rachael got to work on it</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876960\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694144.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876960\" width=\"720\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">She free-painted and varnished the floor, which took her two days of non-stop work</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876957\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589693943.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876957\" width=\"960\" height=\"720\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Pictured as a work in motion</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>When I&#8217;m in the zone with decorating, I can&#8217;t get out of it. I re-did my whole kitchen in a week. I sanded down and repainted the cupboards, spray painted the handles, painted the walls, floor, ceiling and my fridge.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>I&#8217;m a slave driver to myself, it was non-stop and I was surviving on about four hours&#8217; sleep &#8211; and fasting so I didn&#8217;t have to cook.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But I got there in my end and it looks amazing. My mum and my kids&#8217; dad looked after the girls, and my sister came to help me paint the walls.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The first time I cooked in my new kitchen, I was so nervous, because it took me two days just to paint and varnish the floor.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t<blockquote class=\"article__quote\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article__quote-copy theme__before-color theme__after-color\">\n\t\t\t<p>The only furniture I bought brand new was my sofa and my bed, which are both from IKEA. Almost everything else was given to me</p>\n\t\t\t\t<cite class=\"article__quote-credit theme__copy-color\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"quote-credit\">Rachael Havenhand</span><span class=\"quote-credit-meta\">28</span>\t\t\t\t</cite>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t</blockquote>\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>For a couple of weeks, I hated cooking in there, because I didn&#8217;t want to ruin the pristine floor. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>You can&#8217;t help but make a mess when you&#8217;re cooking sometimes, but as long as I clean it immediately, it stays in a good condition.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>I think in total, with all the paint, furniture, accessories and upcycling, I&#8217;ve spent about £2,500 on the place.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The only furniture I bought brand new was my sofa and my bed, which are both from IKEA. I bought the most expensive mattress, which was about £400. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876942\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694150.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876942\" width=\"720\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Rachael got this piano free from a church and painted it blue</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11877017\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694224.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11877017\" width=\"720\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Every inch of the house is covered in colour</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11877020\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589694008.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11877020\" width=\"720\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Rachael says bright colours make her feel happy</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Almost everything else was given to me. My piano was gifted to me by a local church, they absolutely love that I painted it bright blue, although I’m about to paint it again. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>My table and chairs were given to me free. Sometimes I even mix my own paint colours to save money. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>My elderly neighbour across the road will message me and say ‘Rachael I’ve got this, would you like it?’ She goes to antique fairs, so I get all sorts from her. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11877025\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589693945.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11877025\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Even the bathroom has been given a colourful makeover</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11876940\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 550px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000589693944.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=540\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-11876940\" width=\"540\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">This vintage love seat was her best bargain &#8211; at 99p</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>None of them mind, I always warn them I will probably paint the furniture. If they did mind, I’d turn it down. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>I’ve got a load of furniture in my garage ready to do up. The plan was to upcycle it all in my signature quirky and colourful style, then sell it on. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>But I’m so busy with my print business, running my Instagram and working with brands that it’s on the back burner.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Facebook Marketplace is fantastic for bargains and I love eBay too.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-fabulous\" data-slide-count=\"4\" returns from hols to find parents transformed her flat for £50\t\t\t</span>\n\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail__item-content -->\n\t<div class=\"rail__item-gradient-light\">\n\n\t</div>\n\t<a -->\n\t\n\t<div class=\"rail__item-content\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"rail__item-headline theme__copy-color\">\n\t\t\t\tAMAZING SPACE\t\t\t</h3>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"rail__item-sub\">\n\t\t\t\tSavvy 12-year-old overhauls her childish bedroom into a grown up space\t\t\t</span>\n\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail__item-content -->\n\t<div class=\"rail__item-gradient-light\">\n\n\t</div>\n\t<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12485564/teen-bedroom-makeover-home-bargains/\" class=\"rail__item-anchor\"></a>\n\n</div><!-- .rail__item .swiper-slide -->\n\n<div class=\"rail__item swiper-slide\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__item-image\">\n\t\t\t<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12484090/i-spent-my-21st-birthday-cuddling-my-stillborn-baby-now-im-selling-her-tiny-clothes-so-i-can-afford-a-headstone/\">\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"delayed-image-load-landscape\" data-src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-comp-stillborn-baby.jpg?strip=all&#038;w=300&#038;h=192&#038;crop=1\"></div>\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"delayed-image-load-mobile\" data-src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-comp-stillborn-baby.jpg?strip=all&#038;w=300&#038;h=192&#038;crop=1\"></div>\n\t\t\t</a>\n\t\t\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail__item-image -->\n\t\n\t<div class=\"rail__item-content\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"rail__item-headline theme__copy-color\">\n\t\t\t\tMUM&#039;S PAIN\t\t\t</h3>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"rail__item-sub\">\n\t\t\t\tI spent 21st cuddling my dead baby, now I&#039;m selling her clothes for a headstone\t\t\t</span>\n\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail__item-content -->\n\t<div class=\"rail__item-gradient-light\">\n\n\t</div>\n\t<a -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>Before people realised I liked free furniture, I would be on eBay every single night, scouring the local area for a chest of drawers or something like that.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>I once bought a vintage love seat for 99p, I still can&#8217;t believe I got that. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>I painted it with emulsion and PVA glue, then waxed it and gave it to my mum. It looks a bit like leather now &#8211; and only cost me a tenner to do it up. kitchen today as she made pancakes with her four-year-old daughter Noa.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/8740902/chantelle-taylor-eastenders-actress-jessica-plummer/\">Chantelle Atkins star</a>, who appears on tonight&#8217;s EastEnders: Secrets From The Square, often shares glimpses of her home online.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496313\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ceff16d0-4431-4cbe-854f-63e86dba73c5.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496313\" width=\"640\" height=\"892\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>EastEnders&#8217; Jessica Plummer showed her kitchen on Instagram today[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>And today she let viewers into her kitchen, with her adorable daughter perched on the worksurface scooping peanut butter out of a jar with a knife.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Wearing an oversized Pulp Fiction T-shirt, Jessica explained: &#8220;All we do is make pancakes and dance to the radio.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The 27-year-old star is set to return to her hard-hitting domestic violence storyline with husband <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/9897794/eastenders-spoilers-abusive-gray-atkins-wife-chantelle-left-him/\">Gray Atkins</a> when EastEnders comes back next month.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But, like many of us, she has been spending plenty of time in her gorgeous home in recent months.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496327\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/4c6f2559-5498-42e3-be95-a52c55dc0154.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-11687726\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Jessica has even let fans into her elegant white-tiled bathroom[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Pictures posted by the star on Instagram show the London pad has an original fireplace, modern tiled bathroom and a sprawling patio.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The living room has a huge flat screen TV and various trinkets placed on her impressive original black fireplace.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Among the decorations is a silver disc, which may date back Jessica&#8217;s days in girl group Neon Jungle, who supported Jessie J but went their separate ways in 2015.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She&#8217;s even let fans into her bright white bathroom, which features the same tiles that are on show in the kitchen.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_11687725\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Trump is the ‘only one’ taking action to send out $1,200 checks because Dems ‘failed,’ WH chief of staff says","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12495982/president-trump-stimulus-checks-coronavirus-democrats-meadows/","description":"<p>WHITE House Chief of Staff Mark Meadows said President Trump is the &#8220;only one&#8221; making moves to get financial relief to American people amid the ongoing coronavirus pandemic. </p>\n<p>Meadows slammed <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/topic/democratic-party/\">Democrats</a> on Capitol Hill who he said &#8220;failed to come together on anything that would address &#8230; enhanced unemployment [and] eviction protections,&#8221; during a Monday <a href=\"https://www.cbsnews.com/video/chief-of-staff-mark-meadows-on-trumps-rnc-speech-stimulus-talks-and-kellyanne-conways-departure/#x\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">interview with CBS This Morning</a>.</p>\n<p><strong><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/26a0.png\" alt=\"⚠\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" />Click here for the latest news on <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1289096/trump-news-biden-latest/\">Donald Trump</a> </strong></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12495978\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/39ac8669-9728-4478-8bba-d0c295504ece.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495978\" width=\"960\" height=\"627\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Mark Meadows said Trump is the &#8216;only one&#8217; acting to get financial relief to Americans[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12495980\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000601346879-24.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495980\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>It&#8217;s unclear when, and if, a second round of stimulus checks will be sent to Americans[/caption]</p>\n<p>Meadows went on to say that because of this &#8220;failure,&#8221; <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/who/donald-trump/\">the president</a> took matters into his own hands by issuing four executive orders aimed at providing economic relief at the beginning of August. </p>\n<p>Extended enhanced unemployment benefits and eviction protections were included in the president&#8217;s orders, as well as a payroll tax cut and a continued suspension of student loan payments. A second round of stimulus checks for qualified Americans was not included. </p>\n<p>Meadows applauded the president&#8217;s moves, but called on Congress to move on a relief bill as well. </p>\n<p>&#8220;I&#8217;m calling on Congress to come together,&#8221; he said. </p>\n<p>&#8220;This president is willing to sign it. Hopefully, we&#8217;ll get something done.&#8221;</p>\n<p>\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">CHECK IT OUT: When are the second stimulus checks being sent out?</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t</p>\n<div>\n<p>Congress has yet to come to an agreement on what should be included in a second coronavirus relief package. </p>\n<p>House Democrats passed the $3trillion HEROES Act in May, but Senate Republicans countered with a much slimmer $1trillion package. </p>\n<p>Both packages included another $1,200 check for eligible Americans.</p>\n<p>Since Congress adjourned for a summer recess, it is unlikely that a bill will pass in August. </p>\n<p>However, there is some hope that Congressional Dems and Republicans will return on September 8 with a renewed focus on passing a bill &#8211; and start getting checks out within weeks. </p>\n</div>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t</p>\n<p>Meadows has been highly critical of Democrats when it comes to passing another <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/topic/coronavirus/\">coronavirus</a> relief package, as has the president. </p>\n<p>House Democrats passed the $3trillion HEROES Act in May, but Senate Republicans countered with a much smaller $1trillion package this month. Both packages did include another round of $1,200 <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/topic/stimulus-checks/\">stimulus checks</a> for eligible Americans.</p>\n<p>However, Democrats and <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/topic/republican-party/\">Republicans</a> have not been able to come to an agreement about how to move forward on several aspects of a relief package &#8211; with <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1356940/pelosi-slams-trump-coronavirus-delaying-bill/\">both sides blaming the other for stalling the bill</a>. </p>\n<p>The deadline to agree on a package came and went earlier this month, and Congress adjourned for summer break without coming to an agreement.</p>\n<p>Congress was not meant to meet again until September 8, however, there was some hope that talks of stimulus checks would begin again when House Speaker Nancy Pelosi called lawmakers back to Washington DC last week for a vote on a $25billion funding bill for the US Postal Service.</p>\n<p>However, a bill has still not been agreed on.</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row checks remains uncertain. </p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.forbes.com/sites/jrose/2020/08/24/sorry-america-but-the-second-stimulus-check-may-not-happen-after-all/#363af3f68795\" target=\"_blank\" bill in September. </p>\n<p>In that case, Americans could see another round of checks hit their bank accounts in October. </p>\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"William Muir not tempted by French riches as he prepares stable star Pyledriver for another Classic shot in St Leger","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/horseracing/12485646/william-muir-pyledriver-st-leger/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>WILLIAM Muir will avoid the temptations of France with Pyledriver to live the Leger dream.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>After adding a Great Voltigeur win to his Royal Ascot triumph last week, Muir’s stable star has been one of the stories of the summer.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12485682\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602885728.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12485682\" width=\"960\" height=\"619\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>Pyledriver defied a penalty in the Great Voltigeur at York last week[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>And now Pyledriver will have one last shot at Classic glory in next month&#8217;s St Leger at Doncaster.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Muir told <em>Sun Racing</em>: “We had the owners over on Saturday and it looks like we’ll go to Doncaster with him.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“The French are trying their best to get us to go to the Grand Prix de Paris because if we win that we’d get a free run in the Arc.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“But at the moment he’s not in it and there’s no way I’d pay a supplementary fee. It’s not worth it with all the restrictions in place.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“It’s not completely set in stone, we’ve already changed a couple of times this season, but you only get one go at a Classic.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“He’s a three-year-old and we can always go for the likes of the Arc next season.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Pyledriver’s first crack at a Classic ended in despair when he was taken off his feet in the early stages of the Derby and jockey Martin Dwyer could only ease him home.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But he will be given the chance to make amends stepping up to a mile-and-six furlongs for the first time on September 12.</p>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>Muir added: “We don’t need to step up in trip with him, he’s shown how good he is at a mile-and-a-half.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“But I think he’ll be fine over a bit further, he wasn’t stopping at York and there’s stamina in his pedigree on the dam’s side.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“If he gets the trip he’ll be the one to beat as we know he’s got gears.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The bookies are finally treating Pyledriver with more respect with only Aidan O’Brien’s <strong>Santiago </strong>shorter in the Leger betting, with the pair available at 5-2 and 4-1 respectively.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">St Leger Betting (Paddy Power):</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div>\n<ul>\n<li>Santiago 5-2</li>\n<li>Pyledriver 4-1</li>\n<li>Hukum 8-1</li>\n<li>English King 8-1</li>\n<li>Tiger Moth 9-1</li>\n<li>Serpentine 12-1</li>\n</ul>\n</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>Muir added: “People are still saying it’s good to see him back after his Derby flop.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“He didn’t flop! We never stood a chance and we’ve proven that now.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“This horse is still improving, growing still and we know he can be better next season.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“He’s come out of York well but we know he needs to put his weight back on, then if so it’s Doncaster.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“We’re all excited still for the future with this horse.”</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 racist","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12495639/herschel-walker-trump-accused-racist/","description":"<p>\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\">\n\t\t\t\t<div style=\"padding-top: 56%; \">\n\t\t\t\t\t<video\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tdata-video-id=\"6184363365001\" src=\"https://players.brightcove.net/5067014667001/pV1KxHf2t_default/index.min.js\"></script>\n\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t</div>\n\n\t\t\n\t\t<!-- End of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t</p>\n<p>FORMER NFL great Herschel Walker defended <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/who/donald-trump/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">President Trump</a> on Monday night, telling the RNC audience in a stirring speech that his friend of 37 years is no racist. </p>\n<p>Walker, who began a “deep, personal friendship” with the president in 1984, praised the president’s approach to social justice and expressed support for his belief that professional athletes should stand for the anthem.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12495635\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603914850.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495635\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Reuters</figcredit></figure>Herschel Walker, an outspoken Republican, praised President Trump this week at the RNC[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12495637\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603296380-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495637\" width=\"960\" height=\"675\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Trump and Walker began their friendship in 1984, when Trump purchased the New Jersey Generals[/caption]</p>\n<p>“Just because someone loves and respects the flag, our national anthem and our country doesn’t mean they don’t care about social justice,” Walker said.</p>\n<p>“I care about all those things, so does Donald Trump. He shows how much he cares about social justice in the black community through his actions&#8230;”</p>\n<p>Following the death of George Floyd, the NBA allowed players to write phrases related to social justice on their jerseys, with the NFL reportedly planning to implement similar measures.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12495638\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 663px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604032166.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=653\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495638\" width=\"653\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images Sport Classic - Getty</figcredit></figure>Walker&#8217;s impressive athletic career includes playing football for the (now-defunct) USFL and NFL, as well as time as an MMA fighter [/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12495631\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603295527-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495631\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Last week, Walker called out the Democratic National Convention for focusing too much on race[/caption]</p>\n<p>The NFL star running back and winner of the coveted Heisman Trophy said that he considers it a “personal insult” when the president is accused of racism.&#160;</p>\n<p>The two first met when Trump purchased the New Jersey Generals, a team in the United States Football League &#8211; an organization which Walker played for prior to joining the NFL. The USFL no longer exists.</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1347413/pro-trump-football-legend-herschel-walker-democrats/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Last week, Walker slammed Democrats for focusing</a> too heavily on race in their national convention.</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div
