before meeting with him.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Teresa Helm described the alleged abuse at the hands of the financier who she met when she was just 22 in 2002.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_1352326\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000595627111-21.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-1352326\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Ghislaine Maxwell allegedly told a young woman to &#8216;give Epstein what he wants&#8217; before her first encounter with him</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496077\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 708px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000599305886.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=698\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496077\" width=\"698\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Twitter/TeresaHelm</figcredit></figure>Teresa Helm alleges Epstein sexually assaulted her during a job interview[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The now-40-year-old alleges that she spoke to Maxwell, 58, before a job interview with the sex offender, 66, at his New York mansion.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Speaking in new documentary Surviving Jeffrey Epstein, she claims the millionaire&#8217;s alleged &#8220;madam&#8221; warned her: &#8220;Make sure you give Jeffrey what he wants. Jeffrey always gets what he wants.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Teresa says that Epstein asked for a foot rub during the interview before he moved his toes into &#8220;intimate parts&#8221; of her body.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She alleges that when she tried to leave, the financier grabbed her and sexually assaulted her.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In the doc, she said: &#8220;He literally ate, slept, f***ed. That’s all he did. Abuse. It was a revolving door of girls coming through.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Ghislaine Maxwell denies all allegations of sexual misconduct made against her.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The British socialite, daughter of disgraced media mogul Robert Maxwell, pleaded not guilty to helping Epstein, 66, recruit and abuse underage girls.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She is also charged with committing perjury by denying under oath her involvement in her ex-lover&#8217;s alleged sex trafficking scheme.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row Hodge","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000595627111-21.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn28@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-46-57-020_e3677331965db263.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000599305886.jpg?strip=all&w=698":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn84@2020_1/2020/08/25/16-47-11-817_df532615c05f53d8.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603140312.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn32@2020_5/2020/08/25/16-47-08-806_9ef214e327dc7337.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000598419286-5.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn31@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-47-02-453_568065e59b1b3819.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016699},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Virgin Atlantic set to keep flying as £1.2billion rescue deal is approved","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12491546/virgin-atlantic-bailout-september/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>VIRGIN Atlantic </strong>has been saved from going bankrupt after creditors voted to approve a £1.2 billion bailout package this afternoon. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>In a statement, the carrier said that its creditors had voted &#8220;overwhelmingly&#8221; in favour of the proposal.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491763\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000390602876.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491763\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alamy</figcredit></figure>The company’s creditors will vote on a £1.2 billion rescue deal needed to secure the airline&#8217;s future [/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The airline said: “Today,&#160;Virgin Atlantic has reached a significant milestone in safeguarding its future, securing&#160;the overwhelming support of all four creditor classes,&#160;including 99% support from trade creditors who voted in favour of the plan.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Achieving this milestone puts Virgin Atlantic in a position to rebuild its balance sheet, restore customer confidence and welcome passengers back to the skies as soon as they are ready to travel.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Another UK court hearing will be held on Sept 2 to approve the plan, and a procedural hearing is scheduled for Sept 3 in the United States.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Richard Branson’s airline <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12313844/richard-branson-virgin-atlantic-bankruptcy-protection/\">filed for bankruptcy protection in the US</a> at the start of the month in an effort to save the company and thousands of jobs after it fell into administration.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Virgin Atlantic has been hit hard by the pandemic, with thousands of planes grounded worldwide in April due to fears over the spread of the virus.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Today the company’s creditors voted on the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12118154/richard-branson-virgin-atlantic-rescue-deal-jobs/\">£1.2 billion rescue plan originally agreed in July</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It included a £170million cash injection from US hedge fund Davidson Kempner and means Sir Richard Branson maintains a controlling stake in the businesses.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The deal means 170 of the airline&#8217;s suppliers have agreed to take a 20% cut in the money owed to them. The rest will be paid back in installments. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The airline, which is 51% owned by Richard Branson&#8217;s Virgin Group and 49% by U.S. airline Delta, said it “remains confident” in the restructuring plan and is on track to become solvent again by September.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Creditors needed to support the vote if the airline was to keep flying. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>At an earlier hearing Virgin Atlantic lawyer David Allison QC told the High Court passenger demand had &#8220;plummeted to a level that would until recently have been unthinkable&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He added the company would “run out of money altogether” by the final week of the month if help wasn’t granted.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Globally, the travel and aviation industry is feeling the financial hit following months of lockdown and cancelled flights and holidays.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It is expected that<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/travel/12314489/three-million-british-travel-and-tourism-jobs-on-verge-of-disappearing-due-to-coronavirus/\"> nearly three million British travel and ­tourism jobs </a>are on the verge of disappearing — while the economy is close to losing £142billion from the travel sector.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>There are fears that closures of airlines and travel firms will push up the cost of taking a holiday in the future. </p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11501983/british-airways-12000-workers-redundant/\">British Airways</a> are slashing up to 12,000 jobs from its 42,000-strong workforce due to a collapse in flight numbers.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12301070/hays-travel-redundancy-jobs-covid/\">Hays travel</a> announced 878 employees out of 4,500 could lose their jobs.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12467845/sta-travel-ceases-trading-coronavirus/\">STA Travel UK has gone out of business </a>leaving thousands of customers chasing refunds.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Branson, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/4412685/richard-branson-nhs-necker-island/\">who has a personal wealth of almost £4 billion</a>, faced criticism after calling on the UK government to help prop up the firm.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He previously lobbied for a £500million loan funded by public cash to help keep the airline alive.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The billionaire said he was prepared to put his private Caribbean hideaway <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/11447014/richard-branson-necker-island-secrets-fire-coronavirus/\">Necker Island </a>up as collateral to save the +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000390602876.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"fccc4db2d44f7c64cd0ba729f70b606f","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn87@2020_1/2020/08/25/16-46-58-993_9e1fa77642ad537c.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":640,"sourceBytes":41286,"destBytes":41286,"author":"The 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Granddad of boy, 12, hit with hammer & stabbed in back by thug teens says ‘sick’ attackers had taunted family for months","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12496091/pitsea-essex-boy-stabbed-granddad/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>THE granddad of a 12-year-old boy hit with a hammer and knifed in the back by thug teenagers said the yobs had taunted his family for months. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The schoolboy was airlifted to the Royal Free Hospital in London following the shocking attack on Mayfair Avenue in Pitsea, Essex, yesterday. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496417\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603860491-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496417\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>BiPM MEDIA</figcredit></figure>The boy was attacked in an alleyway off Mayfair Avenue at around 2pm yesterday[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>It is understood the knife narrowly missed the boy&#8217;s lung, but he is now expected to make a full recovery and could return home as soon as this evening. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Four teenagers, a girl and three boys, all aged 14, have been arrested on suspicion of causing grievous bodily harm and remain in custody.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Speaking to The Sun, the boy&#8217;s granddad, 78 &#8211; who cannot be named for legal reasons &#8211; said the youngster had been left &#8216;badly shaken&#8217; by the attack. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>He said: &#8220;They’ve been targeting the whole family for months, throwing rocks at the windows, shouting abuse out in the street. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;They’ve had to have cameras put in at the house already. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;“I don’t know why they’ve been picking on him [the boy], although this is the first time anything as serious as this has happened.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;It’s sickening. We’re all very badly shaken by it.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;One of them hit him over the head with a hammer and the other one stabbed him in the back.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;It’s shocking for young kids to be so violent. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;He could be leaving hospital today and thankfully it looks like he’s going to make a full recovery.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Police today said the attack came following a &#8216;verbal disagreement&#8217; and the boy was lucky not to have been more seriously hurt. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>A family member of the arrested girl said her family were &#8216;disgusted&#8217; by the attack.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She said: &#8220;We&#8217;re disgusted by what&#8217;s happened, we just hope the boy&#8217;s OK.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;We don&#8217;t want to speak for her, she&#8217;s out of control.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The boy was attacked in an alleyway, where he is said to have been cornered by yobs before being set upon.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Shocked residents described seeing the alleyway covered in blood as an air ambulance landed nearby.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>One neighbour, who lives near two of the arrested boys but asked not to be named, saw the suspects being arrested minutes later.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He said: &#8220;I saw them being led into the police car, they must have run off after the stabbing. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;They looked like they couldn’t have cared less. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>“That alleyway’s known for drug dealing, there are kids aged 12,13,14 out there dealing for the older ones because if they get caught there’s no consequences. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>“The two boys in particular are notorious around here for causing problems like robberies and vandalising cars. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>“They’re your worst nightmare when you live in a place like this.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Police are still appealing for witnesses to the attack, which took place in broad daylight at around 2pm, to come forward.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Detective Inspector Sophie Hammonds, of Essex Police said: “[The boy] is now in a stable condition in hospital, where he is being kept in as a precaution.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container 2016.</p>\n\n\n\n<div class=\"wp-block-group\"><div class=\"wp-block-group__inner-container\">\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<h2><a chipped in with 66 goals in 149 appearances since arriving.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But Juventus have been keen to get his huge £6.7million annual salary off the books. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Higuain&#8217;s contract with the Italian club was not set to expire until 2021.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Reports claimed he would only leave if he was paid the £6.7m in wages he is due for the remaining year of his -->\n\t\n\t<div class=\"rail__item-content\">\n\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"rail__item-headline theme__copy-color\">\n\t\t\t\tHARRY IN\t\t\t</h3>\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<span class=\"rail__item-gradient-light\">\n\n\t</div>\n\t<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12493424/england-squad-maguire-southgate-sterling/\" class=\"rail__item-anchor\"></a>\n\n</div><!-- .rail__item .swiper-slide -->\n\t\t\t\t\t</div><!-- .swiper-wrapper -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-button-prev theme__background-color-rgba-80\"></div>\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-button-next theme__background-color-rgba-80\"></div>\n\n\t\t\t\t</div><!-- .swiper-container -->\n\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail .{rail} .swiper-video-rail .{theme-slug} -->\n\n\t\t</div><!-- .col .sun-col-6 -->\n\t</div><!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index-->\n\t</div> <!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>Pirlo is on a mission to clear out the deadwood at Juventus after taking over from Maurizio Sarri. </p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12385924/blaise-matuidi-inter-miami-juventus-transfer-exit/\">Blaise Matuidi left the club earlier this month</a> to join David Beckham&#8217;s Inter Miami side. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Cristiano Ronaldo was tipped to leave them this summer, but <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12490876/ronaldo-pirlo-juventus-training-serie-a/\">he was pictured at training with the new boss on Tuesday. </a></p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\">\n\t\t\t\t<div style=\"padding-top: 56%; \">\n\t\t\t\t\t<video\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tdata-video-id=\"6184331043001\" data-account=\"5067014667001\"\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tdata-player=\"default\"\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tdata-usage=\"cms:wordpress:5.4.2:1.7.0:javascript\"\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tdata-embed=\"default\" src=\"https://players.brightcove.net/5067014667001/default_default/index.min.js\"></script>\n\t\t\t\t</div>\n\t\t\t</div>\n\n\t\t\n\t\t<!-- End of Brightcove Player -->\n\n\t\t\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 15:07:52 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000562819353.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"299980df119b9028cfd74f9a3d8bf7f0","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn99@2020_3/2020/08/25/16-46-58-378_a8eb83ecea85dd4c.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":616,"sourceBytes":203164,"destBytes":203164,"author":"Joe Miles","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000562819353.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn99@2020_3/2020/08/25/16-46-58-378_a8eb83ecea85dd4c.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016687},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"People with metabolic syndrome ‘three times more likely to die of Covid’","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12495377/people-metabolic-syndrome-three-times-more-likely-die-covid/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>PEOPLE with metabolic syndrome are three times more likely to die if they contract the coronavirus, experts have revealed.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>Patients with a combination of high blood pressure, diabetes and obesity were found to have more severe outcomes than others.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><strong><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/26a0.png\" alt=\"⚠\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /> Read our <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12383728/coronavirus-uk-news-deaths-live-latest-schools/\">coronavirus live blog</a> for the latest news &#38; updates</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495542\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000378040778.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495542\" width=\"960\" height=\"719\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty - Contributor</figcredit></figure>Obesity is one of the conditions included in metabolic syndrome [/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>A study by Tulane University found that people suffering with conditions that increase the risk of cardiovascular disease had higher death rates when catching Covid.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Metabolic syndrome is a cluster of conditions including obesity, high blood pressure, hypertension, high triglycerides and low high-density lipoprotein (HDL) cholesterol.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Experts have now said that the more of these diagnoses that you have “the worse the outcomes” if you contract the coronavirus.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Researchers followed the health of 287 patients that had been hospitalised with Covid at Tulane Medical Centre and the University Medical Center in New Orleans.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They monitored these patients from March 30 to April 5.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>This was the peak of the pandemic in New Orleans.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The researchers found that more than 85 per cent of patients were non-hispanic black.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">What is metabolic syndrome?</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<p class=\"article__content--intro\">\n\t\t\t\t\tTHE NHS states that metabolic syndrome is a combination of several conditions.\t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div>\n<p>Patients who are obese, have high blood pressure and diabetes fall into this category.</p>\n<p>Having all three together is particularly dangerous.</p>\n<p><strong>What are the symptoms?</strong></p>\n<ul>\n<li>inability to control sugar levels</li>\n<li>irritation and swelling of body tissue</li>\n<li>waist of 94cm or more in European men, or 90cm or more in South Asian men</li>\n<li>waist of 80cm or more in European and South Asian women</li>\n<li>high levels of fat in the blood</li>\n<li>blood pressure that is consistently 140/90mmHg or higher</li>\n</ul>\n</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>The mean age was 61 years and the majority of patients were women (57 per cent).</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Almost 66 per cent of the patients who participated in the survey had metabolic syndrome.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The most common conditions were hypertension (80 per cent), obesity (65 per cent), diabetes (54 per cent), and low HDL (39 per cent).</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In order to make a valid comparison, the researchers looked at two groups.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Those who had metabolic syndrome and those who did not.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They found that 56 per cent of metabolic syndrome patients had to be admitted to intensive care, against 24 per cent who did not have the condition.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Of those who required a ventilator, 48 per cent of patients with metabolic syndrome needed one, while just 18 per cent of patients without this condition were put on a ventilator.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Looking at conditions that patients developed and 37 per cent of people with metabolic syndrome developed acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS), against 11 per cent of patients who did not have the condition.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The researchers found that 26 per cent of patients with metabolic syndrome died &#8211; while 10 per cent without the condition also died.</p>\n\n\n\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-deaths-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-1.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-deaths-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large wp-image-12486897\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /></a>\n\n\n\n<p>&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-cases-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-2-1.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/ac-graphic-UK-cases-per-day-linegraph-24-AUG-2-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large wp-image-12491941\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /></a>\n\n\n\n<p>&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>After accounting for age, hospital location, race and sex, the researchers said people with metabolic syndrome were 3.4 times more likely to die than those who did not have the conditions.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The experts said they were five times more likely to need a ventilator, develop ARDS and be admitted to the ICU.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>However, the study did not find an increased rate of mortality when just one of the conditions clustered with metabolic syndrome were identified.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They did however state that being obese or having diabetes were associated with a greater chance that a patient would need to be put on a ventilator or would need to be admitted to the ICU.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Lead author Dr Joshua Denson said: &#8220;Together, obesity, diabetes and pre-diabetes, high blood pressure and abnormal cholesterol levels are all predictive of higher incidents of death in these patients. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;The more of these diagnoses that you have, the worse the outcomes.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He added that the underlying inflammation that is seen with metabolic syndrome may be the driver that is leading to these more severe cases.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-news\" data-slide-count=\"4\" data-slide-count-tablet=\"4\">\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-container\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__header\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"rail__title theme__after-color\">Most read in Health News</h3>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t</div>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-pagination theme__swiper-pagination\"></div>\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-wrapper\">\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\n<div class=\"rail__item swiper-slide\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__item-image\">\n\t\t\t<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12495450/body-freezer-tip-man-arrested-murder/\">\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"delayed-image-load-landscape\" data-src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Colliery-Lane2.png?strip=all&#038;w=300&#038;h=192&#038;crop=1\"></div>\n\t\t\t\t<div class=\"delayed-image-load-mobile\" considered a composite predictor of Covid-19 lethal outcome, increasing the odds of mortality by the combined effects of its individual components,&#8221; Dr Denson said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Dr Denson also advised that anyone who has metabolic syndrome should be vigilant when it comes to their exposure to the virus.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;It doesn&#8217;t matter if you&#8217;re young or old &#8212; we took that into account.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;You really should be extra careful. I would say it should impact both preventing your exposures and, if you end up getting sick, you should probably see your doctor sooner.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start of Brightcove Player 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Harry Maguire GUILTY of aggravated assault, resisting arrest and bribery over Mykonos brawl","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12495342/harry-maguire-trial-verdict-sister-brawl/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>HARRY Maguire has today been found GUILTY of assault, resisting arrest and bribery over the Mykonos brawl.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Man Utd captain, 27, was convicted of all charges by a Greek judge alongside brother Joe and pal Chris Sharman.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496430\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603972332-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496430\" width=\"960\" height=\"864\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Harry Maguire reportedly brawled with Brits after his sister Daisy was injected[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603457487-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"Maguire was held in a cell for two nights after a brawl in Mykonos\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The footballer&#8217;s trial has finished</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000421273847.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"Joe Maguire, centre with Harry right and brother Laurence left, has also been charged \" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Joe Maguire, centre with Harry right and brother Laurence left, has also been charged</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>The bribery charges carry a maximum sentence of up to three years in jail and a fine.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>All three are due to be sentenced soon.</p>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<p><strong>What we know so far:</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<ul><li>Harry Maguire <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12492131/harry-maguire-trial-live/\">has been found guilty of all charges after going on trial with brother Joe and pal Chris Sharman </a></li><li>The court was told sister <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12492905/harry-maguire-sister-injected-mykonos-albanians-brawl/\">Daisy was injected in the arm by Albanian men, causing her to faint</a></li><li>A police officer was punched and one needed first aid when a scuffle allegedly broke out between officers and the trio</li><li>After being taken to a police station, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12490898/harry-maguire-mykonos-fight-trial-brother-man-utd/\">Maguire was kicked in the leg by a cop who told him his career was &#8220;over&#8221;, it was said</a></li><li>The court was told <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12493289/harry-maguire-brother-slams-cop-boast/\">Maguire then tried to pay cops off </a>&#8211; boasting: &#8220;Don&#8217;t you know who I am?&#8221;</li><li><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12493424/england-squad-maguire-southgate-sterling/\">Maguire was named in Gareth Southgate&#8217;s England squad for the upcoming Nations League games </a></li></ul>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<p>It came after a bombshell one-day trial heard how the brawl between cops and the trio erupted when Maguire&#8217;s sister Daisy was &#8220;injected with a rape drug&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>One cop required first aid when handcuffed Maguire attempted to break free &#8211; as another pal yelled &#8220;f**k, f**k the police&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>After they were taken inside a police station, £190,000-a-week Maguire boasted about how &#8220;rich&#8221; he was as he tried to pay police off, it was said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He bragged: &#8220;Do you know who I am? I am the captain of Manchester United, I am very rich, I can give you money, I can pay you, please let us go”.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Maguire is then said to have continued boasting about how &#8220;very rich&#8221; he is, adding: &#8220;I am the captain of Manchester United&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496672\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 728px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604057290.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=718\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496672\" width=\"718\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Nick Obank - The Sun</figcredit></figure>Dad Alan leaves the court in Syros today[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495152\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 638px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604027731.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=628\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495152\" width=\"628\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Nick Obank - The Sun</figcredit></figure>Ashden Morley arrives at court today to give evidence[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The court was also told how Daisy was approached by two mysterious Albanians in Mykonos as her brother and a group of pals went to get burgers after a night out boozing.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But Maguire&#8217;s fiancee Fern Hawkins soon realised her eyes were &#8220;rolling into the back of her head&#8221; &#8211; with the Albanians then fleeing, it was claimed.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Giving evidence at the Utd captain&#8217;s trial in Syros today, friend Ashden Morley said: &#8220;We held Daisy. Daisy began to start fitting. All the girls were screaming.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“People were coming down asking what happened, there was a large commotion.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>At this point, a minibus Maguire had booked showed up so the panicked group piled on and told the driver they wanted to go to a hospital, it was said.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495212\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 749px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604005440.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=739\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495212\" width=\"739\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Nick Obank - The Sun</figcredit></figure>He said the group feared they were being kidnapped when allegedly attacked by police[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>But Mr Morley said they realised two cars were behind them &#8220;following our every movement&#8221; before the vehicle pulled up in a courtyard.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He added: &#8220;Our bus door opened and five or six males tried to force us off the bus by physically pulling us.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The quantity surveyor, 28, told the court how they all feared they would be kidnapped and &#8220;held at ransom&#8221; as they were beaten with batons and kicked and stamped on by undercover cops.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>One officer then allegedly kicked Maguire on the leg and told him: &#8220;Your career is over&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>As the girls were “in hysterics crying their eyes out”, the England star, 27, was arrested along with brother Joe and pal Chris Sharman.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490987\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 365px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603970086.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=355\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490987\" width=\"355\" height=\"406\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Chris Sharman, left, with Joe, right and Laurence Maguire, centre, is also going on trial[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The claims were made today as the trial kicked off in explosive fashion.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And it also came as <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12493424/england-squad-maguire-southgate-sterling/\">Maguire was named in Gareth Southgate&#8217;s England squad for the upcoming Nations League games amid fears he would miss out.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>But Southgate has not mentioned whether the verdict will affect his decision, which was announced before Maguire was convicted.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Maguire&#8217;s top human rights lawyer Alexis Anagnostakis earlier tried three times to postpone the case but the judge dismissed his protests.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Once it finally got underway, he told the trial how the defender was &#8220;attacked by an Albanian group&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He also denied the group would say &#8220;f**k Greece&#8221; &#8211; claiming &#8220;they love the country and are keen on the ancient Greek culture.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It was then claimed there is video shot from outside <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/mykonos/\">Mykonos </a>police station showing how the police &#8220;mistreated&#8221; them.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The footage also shows them in a state of &#8220;extreme agony&#8221;, Mr Anagnostakis said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The lawyer added: &#8220;My clients did not beat anyone, accost anyone, or injure anyone.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Dad Alan has travelled to the court on the Greek island of Syros today to support his sons.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But none of the defendants &#8211; including Maguire &#8211; were in court today and are instead being represented by their legal team.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492021\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604007449.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492021\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Nick Obank - The Sun</figcredit></figure>Harry&#8217;s dad Alan is in court in Syros today[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12486846\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603822108.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12486846\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Splash News</figcredit></figure>Daisy Maguire has returned to Britain [/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12486838\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 417px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603824910.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=407\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12486838\" width=\"407\" height=\"400\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Splash News</figcredit></figure>She was reportedly stabbed in the arm [/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496081\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 650px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604049533.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496081\" width=\"640\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>SnapperSK</figcredit></figure>Laurence Maguire pictured at home today [/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>They had been partying in a swanky nightclub in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/mykonos/\">Mykonos </a>when sister Daisy was approached by a group of Albanian men.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It was previously alleged she was stabbed in the arm with a metal straw when she spurned the advances of the “gangster types”.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The jab drew blood &#8211; with big brother&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/harry-maguire/\">Harry&#160;</a>stepping in to defend her when a fight broke out.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A source said: “Harry saw what was happening and remonstrated with them and things got heated.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“He decided to try to get out of there and wanted to hail a taxi. But he ended up arguing with some undercover police officers and ended up at the local police station.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>When plain-clothed police came to break it up, the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/manchester-united/\">Utd </a>captain was allegedly &#8220;verbally abusive to an officer and then hit him&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/6726424/harry-maguire-fern-hawkins-fiancee-children-man-utd/\">£85million centre-back</a> was arrested with Joe and Chris after a fight outside a bar on the Greek island in the early hours of Friday morning.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12464482\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 551px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603268522.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=541\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12464482\" width=\"541\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Daisy had posted a video of the star hours before the drama at Bonbonniere bar</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12464483\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 551px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603268519.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=541\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12464483\" width=\"541\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">It was uploaded 18 hours before the bust-up</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>He spent two nights in a cell with Joe and Chris before appearing before a court on Saturday in Syros.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Maguire is now understood to have travelled back to the UK.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>His sister Daisy was yesterday pictured arriving back in England wheeling a suitcase.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Brother Laurence Maguire was also pictured at the home in England as his brothers Harry and Joe await their fate in a Greek court.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container bribery","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12492131/harry-maguire-news-sister-trial-latest-live/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>MAN Utd captain Harry Maguire has today been found GUILTY in Mykonos of assault, resisting arrest and bribery.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The England star, 27, was arrested with his brother Joe and friend Chris Sharman after the brawl following a three-day drinking session.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>All three defendants, who weren&#8217;t in court for the trial, were charged with assault and violence against an officer.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The brothers were also charged with attempted bribery, while Maguire and Chris stood accused of verbal assault.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The bribery charges carry a maximum sentence of up to five years in jail and a fine.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><strong><em>Follow our live blog for all the latest news and updates.</em></strong></p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 16:46:00 Christodoulou","publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016648},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Mummified ice age pup died with flesh from one of last woolly rhinos in stomach","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tech/12494979/mummified-ice-age-pup-ate-woolly-rhino/","description":"<p><strong>A PUPPY preserved in permafrost since the last ice age feasted on one of Earth’s last woolly rhinos before it met its early demise.</strong></p> \n<p>This is according to experts who examined the mummified pup and found an undigested piece of the ancient rhino creature in its stomach.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12496094\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604049612.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496094\" width=\"960\" height=\"679\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Center for Paleogenetics\n </figcredit>\n</figure>The puppy was found with an undigested meal in its stomach[/caption] \n<p>The discovery was made during an animal autopsy on the ice age canine.</p> \n<p>An undigested chunk of skin with yellow fur was found in the pup’s stomach.</p> \n<p>DNA analysis showed that this slab of flesh belonged to an ancient woolly rhinoceros.</p> \n<p>These creatures went extinct around 14,000 years ago and that’s the same time the puppy is said to have died.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12496093\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604049614.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496093\" width=\"960\" height=\"663\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Center for Paleogenetics\n </figcredit>\n</figure>DNA analysis showed this slab of flesh belonged to a woolly rhino[/caption] \n<figure id=\"attachment_12495772\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000601742931.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495772\" width=\"960\" height=\"636\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  AFP or licensors\n </figcredit>\n</figure>This partially preserved Siberian woolly rhino shows the species had yellowish fur[/caption] \n<p>The puppy was originally discovered in Tumat, northeastern Siberia, in 2011.</p> \n<p>Analysis suggests it was between three to nine months old when it died.</p> \n<p>It’s unclear whether it was the offspring of a dog or a wolf.</p> \n<p>If the puppy was a domestic dog then it is possible it was living with ancient humans, according to the researchers from Stockholm University and the Swedish Museum of Natural History.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12495851\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000601696846.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495851\" width=\"960\" height=\"646\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  SWNS:South West News Service\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Woolly rhinos had giant horn[/caption] \n<p>They’ve published a study on the extinction of woolly rhinos in the journal&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.cell.com/current-biology/fulltext/S0960-9822(20)31071-X?utm_source=EA#%20\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Current Biology</a>.</p> \n<p>If the puppy did live with our humans ancestors then they may have killed the woolly rhino and shared the feast with their canine friend.</p> \n<p>The researchers still haven’t worked out how the puppy died.</p> \n<p>However, the study claims it was the warming climate that killed off the woolly rhinos.</p> \n<p>According to <a href=\"https://www.livescience.com/ice-age-puppy-ate-woolly-rhino.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Live Science</a>, co-author of the study Edana Lord said: “The association of the extinction with the Bølling-Allerød interstadial, a very abrupt warming period [about 14,700 to 12,900 years ago], we suggest that the woolly rhinoceros went extinct due to&nbsp;climate change.”</p> \n<div class=\"article-boxout\"> \n <div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\"> \n  <h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">What is permafrost?</h3> \n </div> \n <div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\"> \n  <p class=\"article__content--intro\"> Here's what you need to know... </p>  \n  <ul> \n   <li>Permafrost is soil that is permanently frozen</li> \n   <li>It’s made of soil, sand and gravel fused together by ice</li> \n   <li>Permafrost is widespread in the northern part of the Northern Hemisphere</li> \n   <li>It’s found across 85 per cent of Alaska, 55 per cent of Russia and Canada, and probably all of Antarctica</li> \n   <li>Because it’s frozen year-round, permafrost offers our best chance of finding preserved archaeological specimens</li> \n   <li>Mammoths and other creatures found frozen in Siberia still have their fur, whiskers and even organs in tact</li> \n   <li>Frozen humans dating back thousands of years have been found still sporting tribal tattoos and wearing fur clothing</li> \n  </ul> \n </div> \n</div> \n<!-- Start of Brightcove Player --> \n<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: 0px; max-width: 640px;\"> \n <div style=\"padding-top: 56%; \"> \n  <video data-video-id=\"6047304102001\" data-account=\"5067014667001\" data-player=\"default\" 0;\"> \n  </video> \n  <script src=\"https://players.brightcove.net/5067014667001/default_default/index.min.js\"></script> \n </div> \n</div> \n<!-- End of Brightcove Player --> \n<!--googleoff: news, an <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tech/12492897/mass-grave-discovered-japan-circle-burials/\">ancient burial ground containing</a> over 1,500 bodies squashed into circular graves has been </p>\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 16:18:06 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603793095.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"e9e5a93dbce958871cefbe9a8d954f28","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn63@2020_1/2020/08/25/16-46-57-016_42f081e01d41488b.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":704,"sourceBytes":59882,"destBytes":59882,"author":"Callie Patteson","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603793095.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn63@2020_1/2020/08/25/16-46-57-016_42f081e01d41488b.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603793126.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn63@2020_6/2020/08/25/16-47-10-258_ca891d180dec6d75.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603793029.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn83@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-47-05-387_20e16c00c2b5ffdc.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603793118.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn27@2020_5/2020/08/25/16-47-01-061_fbe5b486e59cce0a.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016660},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Bayern’s Treble-winning manager Flick earns less than £7.5m-a-year Man Utd boss Solskjaer and not even half Jose’s pay","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/champions-league/12496071/bayern-munich-treble-flick-wage/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>LESS than a year ago, Hansi Flick had never managed Bayern Munich &#8211; but he now stands over a stunning treble with a £7.2million pay packet.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The German&#8217;s remarkable rise from unemployed ex-Hoffenheim boss to one of the world&#8217;s top coaches has taken place over the course of a single season.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496409\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/crop-12496218.jpg?strip=all\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12496409\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Reuters</figcredit></figure>Hansi Flick guided Bayern Munich to treble glory despite only being given the caretaker role in November[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Niko Kovac brought in ex-midfielder Flick in July 2019 to help push Bayern on after the Croat&#8217;s stuttering but ultimately successful first year in charge.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>With eight years as Joachim Low&#8217;s assistant under his belt before becoming German FA sporting director, his reputation was already considerable.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/10271640/niko-kovac-sacked-bayern-munich-jose-mourinho/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">when Kovac was dismissed in November</a> and his right-hand man lost two of his first four games as caretaker, few predicted what was about to unfold.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Munich were already impressed enough to award Flick a three-year deal in April, worth £7.2m according to <a href=\"https://www.bild.de/bild-plus/sport/fussball/fussball/fc-bayern-der-triple-trainer-flick-verdient-so-viel-wie-ein-jogi-star-72555198,jsRedirectFrom=conversionToLogin.bild.html#remId=1673531453796173853\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\">Bild</a>, amid speculation Mauricio Pochettino <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/10995560/pochettino-bayern-munich-hansi-flick-deal/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">could take over long-term</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Flick hasn&#8217;t tasted defeat since a December 7 loss to Borussia Monchengladbach and swept his side to the Bundesliga crown via 13-straight wins.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The second part of the treble was bagged with a comprehensive victory over Bayer Leverkusen in the DFB-Pokal final.</p>\n\n\n\n<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/LB-GRAPHIC-PAID-MANAGERS2.jpg\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/LB-GRAPHIC-PAID-MANAGERS2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12165629\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /></a>\n\n\n\n<p>And the Champions League title rounded off a stunning season, dispatching Barcelona 8-2 alongside comfortable wins over Chelsea and Lyon. A <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12461993/psg-bayern-munich-live-reaction-champions-league-final-neymar-coman/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">Kingsley Coman header then secured victory in the final</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Flick&#8217;s wage is far from inconsiderable but is miles behind one of his Bayern predecessors, Pep Guardiola.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Manchester City coach has been unable to deliver the European crown to Eastlands having failed to do so in Bavaria, yet earns £20m-a-year.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Champions Liverpool pay £15m for coach Jurgen Klopp, the same as Tottenham&#8217;s Jose Mourinho.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col .rail__item .swiper-slide -->\n\t\t\t\t\t</div><!-- .swiper-wrapper -->\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-button-prev theme__background-color-rgba-80\"></div>\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-button-next Everton and Leicester, where Carlo Ancelotti bags £11.5m-a-year and Brendan Rodgers is on £10m.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Even newly-promoted Leeds pay more for their coach than the treble winners, with Marcelo Bielsa <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12458426/leeds-marcelo-bielsa-new-contract-premier-league/#:~:text=Bielsa%20led%20Leeds%20back%20to,to%20%C2%A38m%20%E2%80%93%20until%202022.\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">set to be on £8m per season</a> having ended their top-flight exile.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Meanwhile, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer&#8217;s similar status as a relatively untested coach at a big club puts him on a similar pay bracket as Flick, on £7.5m-a-year.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12374351\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><a -->\n\n\t\t\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 15:55:54 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/crop-12496218.jpg?strip=all","linkMd5":"ab274b9f562144d66cc5a9606250b99c","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn75@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-46-58-330_644b7943e461ce15.webp","destWidth":1219,"destHeight":812,"sourceBytes":186126,"destBytes":186126,"author":"Marc Mayo","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/crop-12496218.jpg?strip=all":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn75@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-46-58-330_644b7943e461ce15.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/LB-GRAPHIC-PAID-MANAGERS2.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn20@2020_6/2020/08/25/16-47-01-048_a1f1898f6ccbcb16.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/VP-GRAPHIC-SPORT-BIGGEST-WAGE-BILLS-EU.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn95@2020_1/2020/08/25/16-47-02-956_8f9e2b2b083d05ee.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016663},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Plague of killer hornets set to invade Britain and destroy bee population, experts warn","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12495454/killer-hornets-invade-britain-bee/","description":"<p style=\"text-align: left\"><strong>A PLAGUE of killer hornets is set to invade Britain and decimate our honeybee population, experts have warned.</strong></p>\n<p>The <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/1857209/what-are-asian-hornets-sting/\">Asian hornet</a>, which is two inches long and has a three-inch wingspan, can kill someone allergic to their venom.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12496112\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-12496112 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/C7GF6Cjpg-JS604027857.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"638\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alamy</figcredit></figure> Deadly Asian hornets could descend on Britain in a matter of weeks[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12496123\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-12496123 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/S2AK7Bjpg-JS604025853.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"688\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alamy</figcredit></figure> The voracious pests can wipe out up to 60 bees a day[/caption]</p>\n<p>The swarm is feared to be heading for <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/britain/\">Britain</a> in the coming weeks and could &#8220;wreak havoc&#8221; on the native bee population.</p>\n<p>The giant hornet, identified by their large size and yellow legs, bites the heads off bees as they leave their hives and can wipe out up to 60 a day.</p>\n<p>Now the Somerset Beekeepers Association wants the public to send in photos of hornets and have developed an app to help people report sightings.</p>\n<p>Lynne Ingram, coordinator of Somerset’s Asian hornet action team, said: “Now is the time to spot the hornets so that their nests can be destroyed before they multiply.</p>\n<p>“If you see a hornet take a photo, send it to us and we’ll do the rest.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: left\">&#8220;Or use the official Asian hornet watch app and report it.”</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: left\">Recent wet weather has created a &#8220;perfect breeding ground&#8221; for the deadly insects and raised fears they could arrive in record numbers on British shores.</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: left\">So far there have been no sightings of any hornets in Britain, but the pests are a common sight in the Channel Islands after arriving in late 2016.</p>\n<p>Lynne, a beekeeper with 30 honeybee colonies near Bridgwater, Somerset, said Asian hornet week from September 7-13 was a key moment in the battle.</p>\n<p>She added: &#8220;The arrival of the hornet in Britain is especially bad news for bees – a favourite food source – and a single hornet can completely devastate a beehive.&#8221;</p>\n<p>Earlier this year The Sun revealed an invasion of Asian hornets could cost the UK £7.6millon a year.</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row introduced to France from China in 2004 and spread across Europe.</p>\n<p>French scientists estimated the cost to the UK of dealing with invasions — by destroying nests, plus the damage they cause to ecosystems and honey production.</p>\n<p>Researcher Prof Franck Courchamp said the nest destruction cost alone in France from 2006 to 2015 had been £20.2million.</p>\n<p><figure abroad due travel chaos caused by the coronavirus.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The popular motor show, hosted by Paddy McGuinness, Andrew Flintoff and Chris Harris, will now remain in the UK for its upcoming episodes. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495949\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img concerns[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>There was a delay on the series being filmed, but it&#8217;s good news for all motorheads as the team is ready to go to ensure the series is back on its feet.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Kate Phillips, BBC&#8217;s entertainment controller explained: &#8220;Top Gear is very much up and running. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;The big difference is we won’t be able to do all the foreign trips although a couple were done before lockdown.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;The inventiveness they have brought to the table, they are very, very funny, proper belly Lamboughini. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Earlier this month, it was <a kids","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12495155/brazilian-congresswoman-accused-kids-murder-husband/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>A BRAZILIAN congresswoman is accused of ordering her children to murder her husband, according to police in Rio de Janeiro.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Flordelis dos Santos de Souza, 59, who is also a pastor and gospel singer, is accused of masterminding the execution of fellow pastor Anderson do Carmo, 42,  in the early hours of June 16 at their home in Niteroi, south-east <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/brazil/\">Brazil</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495585\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603867339.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495585\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AFP</figcredit></figure>Flordelis dos Santos de Souza, 59, is accused of masterminding the plot[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495586\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604044114.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495586\" width=\"960\" height=\"564\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AFP - Getty</figcredit></figure>The couple have over 50 biological and adopted children together[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>According to police, Do Carmo was killed after the couple argued that the congresswoman was giving preferential treatment to her &#8220;favourite children&#8221;. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Cops say the pastor was shot 30 times by his own stepson, with a gun purchased by one of the couple&#8217;s adopted kids.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The pair &#8211; seen as leading figures in Brazil’s Evangelical Christian movement and founders of the Community of the Evangelical Ministry Flordelis &#8211; were parents to more than 50 adopted and biological children, reports the <a href=\"https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-latin-america-53895457\">BBC.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>De Souza had initially reported that her husband died as a result of an armed robbery.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>This was disputed by police, however, who say they have since uncovered an elaborate plan to kill Do Carmo.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Prosecutors said: “Flordelis is accused of orchestrating the homicide, enlisting (several of her grown children) to take part in the crime and attempting to disguise it as an armed robbery.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Investigators also allege that De Souza had attempted to murder her husband on six other occasions by poisoning him.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Police say 10 other people have been charged with the murder, including six of De Souza’s children and one granddaughter.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>While arrest warrants have been issued against nine of the people accused, De Souza’s status as a lawmaker means she cannot be arrested due to her parliamentary immunity under Brazilian laws.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In a case which has gripped Brazilian media, investigators have asked Brazil’s congress to strip De Souza of her status as a parliamentarian in order to formally begin proceedings against her.&#160;&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>According to authorities, Flavio dos Santos Rodrigues, De Souza’s biological son, pulled the trigger on his stepfather with a gun purchased by one of her many adopted children.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Police commissioner Allan Duarte told Brazilian TV network Globo: “The investigation demonstrated that [De Souza&#8217;s] image of altruism and decency was merely a ploy to gain wealth and political power.”</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div between the couple over Do Carmo’s handling of the family’s finances.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>De Souza, however, has denied involvement in the murder.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Her lawyer is reported to have told Brazilian media that the lawmaker is &#8220;upset&#8221; with the investigation because she is innocent and never ordered the &#8220;savage crime&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure Adjei-Darko","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603867339.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn51@2020_1/2020/08/25/16-46-58-759_ba5c49b44e3c2062.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604044114.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn44@2020_5/2020/08/25/16-47-07-902_d88e614a48406c28.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604044070.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn63@2020_2/2020/08/25/16-47-04-885_b848fde90678ab2d.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604044066.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn76@2020_6/2020/08/25/16-47-08-404_51ac0eafd4d1f163.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604044113.jpg?strip=all&w=823":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn15@2020_5/2020/08/25/16-47-05-616_1abda042a5a6ef8a.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604044064.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn59@2020_6/2020/08/25/16-47-05-224_323c44238d31f407.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016688},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Eat Out to Help Out: petition launched to extend the scheme to save thousands of jobs and restaurants","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12495056/eat-out-help-out-petition-extend-save-jobs/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>A PETITION calling for the government&#8217;s 50 per cent off meal deal to be extended beyond August has been launched by diners in a bid to save thousands of jobs.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/eat-out-to-help-out/\">Eat Out to Help Out</a> scheme, which sees the state pick up half of the bill, is due to end next Monday. </p>\n\n\n\n<p><strong><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/26a0.png\" alt=\"⚠\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /> Read our <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12383728/coronavirus-uk-news-deaths-live-latest-schools/\">coronavirus live blog</a> for the latest news &#38; updates</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496039\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604049616.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496039\" width=\"960\" height=\"587\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AFP - Getty</figcredit></figure>Fans are calling for the Eat Out to Help Out scheme to be extended by another month[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The Chancellor&#8217;s scheme has been running every Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday throughout August and has served up 64million meals so far across 87,000 restaurants, according to the latest Treasury figures. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The incentive was launched to get Brits eating out again to boost the economy and support the hospitality industry, which has <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11998264/coronavirus-jobs-armageddon-upper-crust-airbus-easyjet/\">suffered huge blows</a> since the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/coronavirus/\">pandemic</a> lockdown. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>But <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/rishi-sunak/\">Rishi Sunak</a> faces new calls to continue running the scheme throughout September or risk thousands of pub and restaurant jobs being axed. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Around 14million employees in the hospitality sector were put on the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/furlough-scheme/\">furlough </a>scheme in March but only <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12270446/20-workers-furlough-mass-unemployment/\">around a third of them have returned</a> to work.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495995\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/33d2e596-f251-46ff-87fe-14d0892ba524-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495995\" width=\"960\" height=\"597\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Almost 5,000 people have signed a petition to extend the scheme into September</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>The <a href=\"https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333851\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\">petition</a> has so far gained more than 4,700 signatures since launching on Parliament&#8217;s dedicated site earlier this month. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The description reads: &#8220;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12482922/eat-out-to-help-out-scheme-end-extended/\">Extend the Eat Out to Help Out Scheme</a> to September to give restaurants and cafes financial stability prior to a potential second wave of COVID-19 causing local/national lockdowns.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It needs 10,000 signatures for the government to respond and at least 100,000 people to sign up before it will be considered for a debate in the Commons.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Restaurants who have registered with the discount scheme can halve the bill, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12279662/eat-out-help-out-everything-you-need-to-know/\">up to £10 per person and excluding alcoholic drinks</a>, and then claim it back from the government. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Finance group KPMG believes that the fact the initiative is even running at all is a sign of the epic challenges all consumer businesses now face.   </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Federation of Small Businesses (FSB) believes that eateries will struggle to keep customers coming back once the scheme ends. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>It argues that the initiative should at least be continued in areas that have experience local lockdowns and plans should be made to reintroduce the scheme if the economy stalls again. </p>\n\n\n\n\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">How does the Eat Out to Help Out scheme work?</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<p class=\"article__content--intro\">\n\t\t\t\t\tTHE government will cover half of the cost of a meal out, up to £10 a head, including children&#039;s meals. \t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div>\n<p>The discount means that a meal out for one that costs £20 will be reduced to £10, but a £25 meal for one will be slashed to £15 because of the £10 cap per person.</p>\n<p>There is no limit to the number of times you can use the discount, so in theory you can get half price meals on every Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday in August.</p>\n<p>Businesses will need to register with the scheme on Gov.uk before being able to offer the discount, as well as be Food Standards Agency approved.</p>\n<p>Instead of issuing discount&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12053989/voucher-schemes-restaurants-green-homes/\">vouchers&#160;</a>&#8211; which the government felt increased the risk of fraud &#8211; restaurants, cafes and pubs will be able to claim back the cash.</p>\n<p>The refund will then been transferred into restaurants, cafes and pubs&#8217; bank accounts within five working days.</p>\n</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>FSB chair Mike Cherry said: &#8220;These remain difficult times for the small business community, with the stress and strains of this crisis continuing to be felt. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;That’s why we urge everyone to show support for their favourite small firms at every opportunity.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Sadly, it doesn&#8217;t look like there are any plans to extend the scheme. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>A treasury spokesperson told The Sun: &#8220;Part of this popularity is precisely because it is a time-limited scheme – this reminds and encourages people to safely return to going out.</p>\n\n\n\n<p> “The scheme complements a wider package of hospitality support that goes beyond August, including <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12062043/vat-cut-5-hotels-staycations/\">cutting VAT to 5 per cent</a>, paying the wages of furloughed staff, business rates relief and billions in tax deferrals and loans – all helping to protect nearly 2 million jobs in the hospitality industry.”</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-money\" data-slide-count=\"4\" data-slide-count-tablet=\"4\">\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-container\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__header\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<h3 class=\"rail__title theme__after-color\">Most read in claimed thousands of hospitality jobs.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Restaurant Group, which owns Frankie &#38; Benny&#8217;s, Garfunkels and Chiquito, said it <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/11770698/frankie-bennys-coronavirus-crash/\">won&#8217;t be reopening around 120 branches</a> putting 3,000 jobs at risk. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Meanwhile, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12437114/pizza-express-close-73-restaurants-axe-1100-staff/\">Pizza Express is to close 73 restaurants</a> putting 1,700 jobs at risk. </p>\n\n\n\n\t\t<!-- Start stopper Thibaut Courtois held them on a visit to the zoo.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Belgium No1 is enjoying the off-season before the hard work commences ahead of <a /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The Real Madrid stopper feeds a tiny monkey</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>And with travel options limited because of the coronavirus pandemic, the 28-year-old spent his free time at the animal rescue centre in Cadiz.</p>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<h3><strong><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12287166/chelsea-transfer-news-live-kai-havertz-reguilon-chilwell-zaha/\">CHELSEA NEWS LIVE: Click here for the latest Blues news</a></strong></h3>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/thibaut-courtois\">Courtois</a> was given an intimate experience after being given special permission to hold a host of furry friends. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>In pictures uploaded to his Instagram, the stopper can be seen holding cubs, feeding monkeys and stroking tigers. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Alongside the images, he wrote the caption: &#8220;Thanks to the Castellar Rescue Centre for showing me their work and the work they do for these animals.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Courtois was also seen holding a snake &#8211; an image <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/team/1196660/chelsea/\">Chelsea</a> fans will find ironic. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>That is because <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/8572117/chelsea-real-madrid-fans-snake-thibaut-courtois/\">Courtois was branded as much when he handed in a transfer request to force his £35million move to the Bernabeu from the Blues in 2018.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>Chelsea then landed Kepa Arrizabalaga for a world record £71m as his replacement. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495670\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 443px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604045282.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=433\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone centre[/caption]\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div
