tablets</a> combine fun and games.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Topshop has announced a huge summer sale with up to 70 per cent off,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12390808/topshop-slashes-70-off-in-final-summer-sale-what-to-snap-up/\" rel=\"nofollow\">here&#8217;s what to buy</a>.</p>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 15:20:40 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/CM-COMP-AMAZON-SALE-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"48275ab3eaa841cf6b9740efe7a1e947","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn96@2020_3/2020/08/25/16-46-58-267_f6a8d90d5ad49238.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":640,"sourceBytes":114220,"destBytes":114220,"author":"Jennifer Barton","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/CM-COMP-AMAZON-SALE-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn96@2020_3/2020/08/25/16-46-58-267_f6a8d90d5ad49238.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/NINTCHDBPICT000566602758-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn40@2020_2/2020/08/25/16-47-12-295_51a807a1a19672d3.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016683},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Harry Maguire ‘loves ancient Greek culture’ and would never say ‘f*** Greece’, says lawyer after Myknonos ‘cop brawl’","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12496552/harry-maguire-ancient-greek-culture-cop-brawl/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>HARRY Maguire &#8220;loves ancient Greek culture&#8221; and would never say &#8220;f*** Greece&#8221;, his lawyer said today.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It comes as the Manchester United captain was <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12495342/harry-maguire-trial-verdict-sister-brawl/\">found guilty of aggravated assault, resisting arrest, and bribery attempts after a brawl in Mykonos</a>, allegedly sparked when his sister was stabbed.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603457487-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"Maguire was held in a cell for two nights after a brawl in Mykonos\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Harry Maguire was found guilty of assault today</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000421273847.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"Joe Maguire, centre with Harry right and brother Laurence left, has also been charged \" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Joe Maguire, centre with Harry right and brother Laurence left, has also been charged</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492021\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604007449.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492021\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Nick Obank - The Sun</figcredit></figure>Harry&#8217;s dad Alan is in court in Syros today[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The bribery charges carry a maximum sentence of up to three years in jail and a fine. All three are due to be sentenced soon.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Maguire&#8217;s top human rights lawyer Alexis Anagnostakis told the trial in Syros today the bribery charge testimonies are vague.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He said: &#8220;They didn&#8217;t specify what he wanted to pay.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The lawyer added: &#8220;They would never say &#8216;f**k Greece&#8217;, they love the country and are keen on the ancient Greek culture.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Earlier today we told how the court heard <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12490898/harry-maguire-mykonos-fight-trial-brother-man-utd/\">Maguire was kicked by a cop who told him &#8220;your career is over&#8221;.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Manchester United captain was arrested along with his brother Joe and pal Chris Sharman on Thursday morning after a fight erupted in the street.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>His lawyer said Maguire&#8217;s younger sister Daisy was stabbed in the arm &#8211; causing her to pass out.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490987\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 365px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603970086.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=355\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490987\" width=\"355\" height=\"406\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Chris Sharman, left, with Joe, right and Laurence Maguire, centre, went on trial today[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12470874\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 773px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603434231.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=763\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12470874\" width=\"763\" height=\"778\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram / HarryMaguire</figcredit></figure>Harry Maguire reportedly brawled with Brits after his sister Daisy was &#8216;stabbed&#8217;[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Maguire and his group asked to be taken to hospital after the incident, but were driven to a police station instead, where officers allegedly kicked Maguire on the leg and told him: &#8220;Your career is over&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He added: &#8220;My clients did not beat anyone, accost anyone, or injure anyone.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The court heard how once at the police station, Maguire said: &#8220;Do you know who I am? I am the captain of Manchester United, I am very rich, I can give you money, I can pay you, please let us go.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>One of his group also allegedly yelled &#8220;f**k, f**k the police&#8221; before punching an officer.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>None of the defendants were required to attend court and were instead represented by their legal team.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Only Maguire&#8217;s Dad Alan was present in the court on the Greek island of Syros to watch proceedings.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Utd captain <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/harry-maguire/\">Maguire</a>, 27, footballer brother Joe, 28, and pal Chris Sharman have been found guilty of assault and violence against an officer.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But the group will able to appeal the decision in a higher court after being found guilty.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12486846\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603822108.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12486846\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Splash News</figcredit></figure>Daisy Maguire has returned to Britain [/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12486838\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 417px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603824910.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=407\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12486838\" width=\"407\" height=\"400\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Splash News</figcredit></figure>She was reportedly stabbed in the arm [/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>They had been partying in a swanky nightclub in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/mykonos/\">Mykonos </a>when sister Daisy was approached by a group of Albanian men.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But she was allegedly stabbed in the arm with a metal straw when she spurned the advances of the “gangster types”.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The jab drew blood and caused her to faint &#8211; with big brother&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/harry-maguire/\">Harry&#160;</a>stepping in to defend her when a fight broke out.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A source said: “Harry saw what was happening and remonstrated with them and things got heated.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“He decided to try to get out of there and wanted to hail a taxi. But he ended up arguing with some undercover police officers and ended up at the local police station.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>When plain-clothed police came to break it up, the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/manchester-united/\">Utd </a>captain was allegedly &#8220;verbally abusive to an officer and then hit him&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/6726424/harry-maguire-fern-hawkins-fiancee-children-man-utd/\">£85million centre-back</a> was arrested with Joe and Chris after a fight outside a bar on the Greek island in the early hours of Friday morning.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12464482\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 551px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603268522.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=541\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12464482\" width=\"541\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Daisy had posted a video of the star hours before the drama at Bonbonniere bar</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12464483\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 551px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603268519.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=541\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12464483\" width=\"541\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">It was uploaded 18 hours ago before the bust-up</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>He spent two nights in a cell with Joe and Chris before appearing before a court on Saturday in Syros.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Maguire is now understood to have travelled back to the UK.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>His sister Daisy was yesterday pictured arriving back in England wheeling a suitcase.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Brother Laurence Maguire was also pictured at the home in England as his brothers Harry and Joe await their fate in a Greek court.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Sheffield-born Maguire became the world&#8217;s most expensive defender when he signed for Utd from Leicester City for £85million in August last year.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He was named captain in January this year following Ashley Young&#8217;s departure to Inter Milan.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>He is next due to play at Old Trafford for their first game of the season on September 19 against Crystal Palace.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Maguire has made 26 appearances for England and was a key part of the team&#8217;s journey to the World Cup semi-finals in 2018.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But the legal action <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12474478/maguire-may-be-left-out-england-squad-southgate/\">could throw a spanner in the works for strict England gaffer Gareth Southgate when he names his squad on today.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img 04-710_7e2758cf12b44ada.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016650},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"GTA 5 Online has SECRET UFO mission that no one knows how to access","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tech/12495760/gta-5-online-secret-ufo-mission/","description":"<p>GRAND Theft Auto 5 players now have access to a new UFO-themed mission in the hugely popular game’s online multiplayer mode.</p> \n<p>Released earlier this month, the mission tasks players with finding parts for a spaceship locked in a hangar at the Fort Zancudo military base.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12496067\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/1-7.png?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496067\" width=\"960\" height=\"538\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  YouTube/The Game File Gurus\n </figcredit>\n</figure>A new UFO missions has been uncovered in GTA 5’s online multiplayer mode[/caption] \n<p>It’s new to the game following the release of GTA Online’s huge <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tech/12360128/gta-5-update-new-missions-races-vehicles-super-yachts/\">Summer Special update</a>, which added new missions, cars and more on August 11.</p> \n<p>Nobody knows how to activate the UFO mission, which was uncovered by GTA fans behind the <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v3Kbmqa_gEI&amp;feature=emb_title\">“Game File Gurus”</a> YouTube Channel.</p> \n<p>The team regularly trawl through the code of popular video games to find hidden features and missions.</p> \n<p>On Sunday, the group posted a video in which they play the mission using tools to force start it.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12496249\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/2-4.png?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496249\" width=\"960\" height=\"538\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  YouTube/The Game File Gurus\n </figcredit>\n</figure>The mission tasks players with finding parts (green arrow above) for a spaceship locked away in a hangar at a military base[/caption] \n<p>The business battle mission – an online mission that involves picking up items – begins at Fort Zancudo, the military base near Los Santos.</p> \n<p>Players must fight their way through a hoard of what appear to be special agents guardian an enormous UFO within an aircraft hangar at the base.</p> \n<p>Once all the agents have been eliminated, players must collect spaceship parts scattered around the hangar.</p> \n<p>These must then be taken to UFO-obsessed character Omega, who has appeared in alien-themed GTA Online missions in the past.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12496271\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000601148548.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496271\" width=\"960\" height=\"645\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Alamy\n </figcredit>\n</figure>Grand Theft Auto 5 is one of the most successful video games of all time[/caption] \n<p>It’s not clear how players can activate the UFO mission, or what they get for completing it.</p> \n<p>It’s likely players will at the very least earn experience and in-game cash, as well as help you build up supplies that you can sell later.</p> \n<p>Rockstar’s Los Santos Summer Special added a host of new missions and features to GTA Online.</p> \n<p>Among the changes are a new set of co-op missions launched from GTA Online’s Galaxy Super Yachts for between one and three players.</p> \n<div class=\"article-boxout\"> \n <div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\"> \n  <h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">Grand Theft Auto games – a timeline</h3> \n </div> \n <div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\"> \n  <div class=\"article-boxout__content-img\"> \n   <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/image-62.png?strip=all&amp;&amp;w=500&amp;&amp;h=402&amp;&amp;crop=1\" width=\"500\" height=\"402\" /> \n  </div> \n  <p class=\"article__content--intro\"> Here's the full list... </p> \n  <div> \n   <p><strong>Main series:</strong></p> \n   <ul> \n    <li>1997 – Grand Theft Auto</li> \n    <li>1999 – Grand Theft Auto 2</li> \n    <li>2001 – Grand Theft Auto 3</li> \n    <li>2002 – Grand Theft Auto Vice City</li> \n    <li>2004 – Grand Theft Auto San Andreas</li> \n    <li>2008 – Grand Theft Auto 4</li> \n    <li>2013 – Grand Theft Auto 5</li> \n   </ul> \n   <p><strong>Expansion packs:</strong></p> \n   <ul> \n    <li>1999 – Grand Theft Auto London 1969</li> \n    <li>1999 – Grand Theft Auto London 1961</li> \n    <li>2009 – Grand Theft Auto 4 The Lost and Damned</li> \n    <li>2009 – Grand Theft Auto The Ballad of Gay Tony</li> \n   </ul> \n   <p><strong>Handheld games:</strong></p> \n   <ul> \n    <li>2004 – Grand Theft Auto Advance</li> \n    <li>2005 – Grand Theft Auto Liberty City Stories</li> \n    <li>2006 – Grand Theft Auto Vice City Stories</li> \n    <li>2009 – Grand Theft Auto Chinatown Wars</li> \n   </ul> \n  </div> \n </div> \n</div> \n<p>Meanwhile, players have access to more than a dozen new vehicles to purchase from auto websites.</p> \n<p>They include tunable sportscars, off-roaders and a pair of new Open Wheel beauties.</p> \n<p>Rockstar noted last month that more big updates are on the way for GTA Online, including the multiplayer mode’s “biggest ever” update.</p> \n<p>That download will feature “our latest take on Heists in an entirely new location”, Rockstar said.</p> \n<div class=\"oembed-container oembed-youtube\">\n <iframe title=\"Fort Zancudo UFO Business Battle - GTAV / GTAO\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/v3Kbmqa_gEI?feature=oembed\" frameborder=\"0\" recently recreated the franchise’s much-loved San Andreas game with&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tech/12130166/gta-fans-recreate-san-andreas-game-with-mind-blowing-graphics-that-look-like-real-life/\">mind-blowing upgraded graphics</a>.</p> \n<p>Call of Duty has according to a Fortnite boss.</p> \n<p>What’s your favourite GTA game? Let us know in the comments!</p> \n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" /> \n<p><strong>We pay for your stories! Do you have a story for The Sun Online Tech &amp; Science team? Email us at <a href=\"mailto:tech@thesun.co.uk\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">tech@the-sun.co.uk</a></strong></p> \n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 16:02:05 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/1-7.png?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"b20a54885e0695f1ebc323ff760f721c","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn19@2020_2/2020/08/25/16-46-57-006_70f480251c5cfcfd.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":538,"sourceBytes":839553,"destBytes":54904,"author":"Harry Pettit","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/1-7.png?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn19@2020_2/2020/08/25/16-46-57-006_70f480251c5cfcfd.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/2-4.png?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn92@2020_3/2020/08/25/16-47-02-212_4898b647481e19b1.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000601148548.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn3@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-47-02-395_752a57d564ef375f.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/image-62.png?strip=all&&w=500&&h=402&&crop=1":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn76@2020_3/2020/08/25/16-47-01-406_06ebfcdb8cd67ef0.png"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016662},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Proud DIY fanatic shows off the new ‘wing of her house’… and it only cost a couple of quid","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/fabulous/12495915/diy-fan-new-wing-house-quid-3d-door-sticker/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>A MUM managed to add an entire wing to her house for just a few quid &#8211; and people are amazed at how effortless it was. </strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>She was bored of looking at her plain white door, so decided to spice it up with a 3D wall sticker. </p>\n\n\n<div></div>\n\n\n\n<p>The DIY fan opted for one which appears to lead on to another room, with a rug, bookcase and plant visible.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She joked she managed to add a whole &#8216;new wing&#8217; to her house in mere minutes.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And it cost her a lot less than a full extension, after she picked up the sticker on eBay for £16.93 &#8211; with other styles including a staircase and wardrobe available. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>She shared her post to Facebook group <a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/groups/diyonabudgetofficial/permalink/3114752702114025/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\">DIY On A Budget Official</a>, where it’s racked up more than 600 likes. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496495\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604048639.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496495\" width=\"720\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Facebook</figcredit></figure>The mum decided to give her house a makeover for just a few quid[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496496\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 730px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604048640.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=720\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496496\" width=\"720\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Facebook</figcredit></figure>She joked she added a &#8216;new wing&#8217; to her home with the sticker [/caption]\n\n\n\n<ul><li><strong>3D Door Wall Sticker Decal Self Adhesive, eBay, £16.93 &#8211; <a href=\"https://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/313133606971?fbclid=IwAR2lHYT-Kxq3kAtJurZzqTLjtolfytIInBSbjw7XmvFYgC-mvdR_cX9UWEI\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\">buy now</a></strong></li></ul>\n\n\n\n<p>She wrote: “Love my door mural, just added another wing to my house.”&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She added that she decided to go for the 3D look as it: &#8220;Gives my little landing the illusion of space and it was just the right colour.&#8221; </p>\n\n\n\n<p>People have noted how realistic it is, with one person admitting: “I would walk straight into that!”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Another wrote: “Please keep a tally of how many people walk into it.”</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496744\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 865px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/1cdc4c58-ab68-429a-b878-47101d4d3141.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=855\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496744\" width=\"855\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Hundreds of people have liked the mini-makeover, commenting on how realistic it is</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>A third commented: “I couldn’t figure out what I was looking at, it’s so realistic looking.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And this person added: “Imagine the amount of people who would just walk straight into your door! Love it.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>While the wall art may look convincing, the mum confirmed no one has walked into it &#8211; yet. </p>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000598505060-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=540\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496526\" width=\"540\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>The star visited Spain with her husband Mark so quarantined for 14 days on their return[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The star<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12159335/michelle-keegan-mark-wright-loved-up-in-marbella/\"> visited Marbella with her husband, former Towie star Mark Wright</a>, and their pals for a lengthy break. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Upon her return to the UK, she said that the sun-drenched trip was &#8220;worth&#8221; having to spend the following two weeks in quarantine, as required by Government guidelines. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Since being allowed to leave the house again, Michelle has now thrown herself into work with a series of photo shoots. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Last week, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12462954/michelle-keegan-glams-up-photoshoot-london/\">Michelle snapped some photos after travelling into central London for a shoot</a> from her home in Essex. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496681\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 391px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000598127066-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=381\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496681\" width=\"381\" -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>She kept tight-lipped about what the shoot was for but shared some pictures of herself and her hair and make-up artist getting to work.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Meanwhile, Michelle has also been busy catching up with friends and family. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The star has <a Ivy</a> and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12414641/michelle-keegan-celebrate-pals-baby-shower/\">was pictured letting her hair down at a pal&#8217;s baby shower</a>.</p>\n\n\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 16:09:32 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604055063.jpg?strip=all&w=281","linkMd5":"e541dd914aecba6ac152e30cd9faf731","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn9@2020_1/2020/08/25/16-46-56-975_80f04975de1d6273.webp","destWidth":281,"destHeight":493,"sourceBytes":22022,"destBytes":22022,"author":"Natasha 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Kenosha rioters threatens to ‘burn your store down’ as CHURCH and businesses are torched over Jacob Blake shooting","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12496459/kenosha-rioters-threatens-burn-store-jacob-blake/","description":"<p>THIS is the shocking moment looters threatened to &#8220;burn down&#8221; a man&#8217;s store as businesses and a church were torched in Wisconsin. </p>\n<p>Protests erupted after the <a href=\"http://the-sun.com/topic/police\">police</a> shooting of <a href=\"http://the-sun.com/who/Jacob-Blake\">Jacob Blake</a>, 29, who was gunned down in front of his three sons in Kemosha on Sunday. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12496677\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/e685101f-5f21-436f-8648-dd767f9b9d8e.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496677\" width=\"960\" height=\"627\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Jacob Blake protesters lit buildings on fire for two days straight[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12496645\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/71fbca1e-4adf-40b7-b2ef-ecfb993c3c13.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496645\" width=\"960\" height=\"627\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Demonstrators throw tear gas back at law enforcement on August 24, 2020 in Kenosha, Wisconsin [/caption]</p>\n<p>Gov Tony Evers had to bring in the National Guard after <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1365656/jacob-blake-paralyzed-kenosha-wisconsin/\">Blake was left paralyzed in hospital</a>, prompting desperate residents to arm themselves as the riots raged.  </p>\n<p>In one Twitter video, a resident patrolling the streets in his pick up truck pleaded with the rioters to take their issues with cops elsewhere.</p>\n<p>“Just because you people are too scared to go deal with the cops &#8230; take your issues up with them,&#8221; he begged the crowd. </p>\n<p>But one protester shouted out the name of  his business, which was written on the side of his truck.</p>\n<div class=\"oembed-container oembed-youtube\"><iframe title=\"Mercado Media and CJ TV attempt to save Bradford Community Church. Kenosha, WI\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/U5c--1eozhU?feature=oembed\" frameborder=\"0\" allow=\"accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture\" allowfullscreen></iframe></div>\n<p>“We&#8217;ll burn your store down too!” she jeered as he drove away. </p>\n<p>Cops deployed non-lethal munitions to move the crowds on Monday night and into the early hours of Tuesday morning, reports said.</p>\n<p>Bradford Community Church Unitarian Universalist –&#160;which has a <a href=\"http://the-sun.com/topic/Black-Lives-Matter\">Black Lives Matter</a> sign outside –&#160;narrowly avoided being destroyed completely in the inferno on Monday. </p>\n<p>A video shared on their Facebook page showed the building engulfed in flames as Rev. Erik David Carlson credited &#8220;heroic journalists and rain barrels&#8221; for preventing it from being destroyed yesterday.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12496825\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/Screen-Shot-2020-08-25-at-11.40.55-AM.png?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496825\" width=\"960\" height=\"792\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Facebook </figcredit></figure>The church posted this update [/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491095\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603933599.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491095\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>A protester holds up their hands as flames rage[/caption]</p>\n<p>&#8220;Despite the fact that we cannot condone violent response to injustice, we understand and appreciate the anger and frustration that fueled the events of last night,&#8221; the church said in an August 24 statement. </p>\n<p>&#8220;While we are relieved that our church home mostly survived the inferno in the lot next door, we affirm that we would rather lose 100 buildings than one more life to police violence.&#8221;</p>\n<p>Blake&#8217;s family were also on the streets pleading with protesters to be peaceful, according to a <a href=\"https://twitter.com/TMJ4Steve/status/1298094548334383106\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">TMJ4</a> reporter on the scene. </p>\n<p>His relative Monique Sheree Allen claimed it wasn&#8217;t black people &#8220;burning sh** down.&#8221;</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603775882.jpg?w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-large\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Footage from the incident has been circulated online (Raysean White via TMX.news)</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491105\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603927483.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491105\" width=\"960\" height=\"658\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>EPA</figcredit></figure>Two protesters hold their fists in the air as a vehicle burns behind them[/caption]</p>\n<p>&#8220;But we the problem and such a big threat right?&#8221; she raged on Facebook. &#8220;And it&#8217;s f***ed up because it&#8217;s still gon [sic] get blamed on us. Privileged is what it is.&#8221;</p>\n<p>Rioters waved their guns and took to the streets to decry Blake&#8217;s shooting –&#160;but citizens also armed themselves to protect the city and its businesses, according to footage shared on social media. </p>\n<p>The citywide curfew was flouted again last night as police tried to disperse people using tear gas and businesses were torched.</p>\n<p>While businesses and buildings became targets for enraged demonstrators, a church was also burned in the carnage. </p>\n<p>As well as the church, <a href=\"https://www.dailywire.com/news/church-burned-down-during-anti-police-riots-in-wisconsin-report-says\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">The New York Times</a> reported that a mattress store, a storefront church, a Mexican restaurant, a cellphone store, a probation and parole office were all torched. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491084\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603928643.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491084\" width=\"960\" height=\"638\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>EPA</figcredit></figure>Furious protesters took to the streets for the second night in a row[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491087\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603937986.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491087\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AP:Associated Press</figcredit></figure>Huge orange flames leapt from buildings and cars as protesters marched through Wisconsin&#8217;s streets[/caption]</p>\n<p><a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1363690/jacob-blake-shooting-kenosha-protests-fire-cars/\">Pictures show giant orange flames</a> leaping from buildings and cars as protesters ravaged&#160;<a href=\"http://the-sun.com/where/Wisconsin\">Wisconsin</a>&#160;</p>\n<p>Officers fired tear gas around 8.30 pm last night as protesters broke curfew, chanting &#8220;no justice, no peace&#8221;.</p>\n<p>Swathes of furious activists confronted a line of officers who wore protective gear and stood shoulder-to-shoulder in front of the city&#8217;s courthouse entrance.</p>\n<p>Protesters are said to have lit a number of fires, including torching a garbage truck close to the courthouse.</p>\n<p>Already high tensions were exacerbated yesterday after a news conference with Kenosha Mayor John Antarmian, originally to be held in a park, was moved inside the city&#8217;s public safety building.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12491088\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603927486.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491088\" width=\"960\" height=\"589\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>EPA</figcredit></figure>A garbage truck was set alight[/caption]</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603835594-2.jpg?w=960\" alt=\"Jacob Blake is now fighting for his life (Facebook)\" class=\"alignnone size-large\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Jacob Blake is now fighting for his life</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Hundreds of protesters rushed to the building and a door was snapped off its hinges before police in riot gear pepper-sprayed the crowd.</p>\n<p>Earlier this week, <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/news/1359955/cop-knocked-out-brick-kenosha-protest-jacob-blake/\">a cop was hit in the temple after protesters hurled bricks</a> at his colleagues.</p>\n<p>The frightening scenes erupted soon after shocking footage of Blake being shot&#160;circulated online when cops responded to a &#8220;domestic incident.&#8221;</p>\n<p>In the video, the dad can be seen walking towards a car followed by two officers.</p>\n<p>One of them shoots him in front of his three kids as he opens the car door and at least seven shots can be heard.</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail href=\"https://www.change.org/p/tony-evers-charge-the-cops-who-shot-jacob-blake?recruiter=626175437&#38;utm_source=share_petition&#38;utm_campaign=psf_combo_share_abi&#38;utm_term=psf_combo_share_abi&#38;recruited_by_id=7302f8e0-a76c-11e6-8d81-0d8c4a3c16c7&#38;use_react=false\" heading up an investigation into Blake&#8217;s shooting.</p>\n<p>It comes three months after&#160;<a href=\"http://the-sun.com/who/George-Floyd\">George Floyd</a>&#8216;s police custody death in&#160;<a href=\"http://the-sun.com/where/Minneapolis\">Minneapolis</a>&#160;triggered outrage and&#160;<a href=\"http://the-sun.com/topic/Black-Lives-Matter\">Black Lives Matter</a>&#160;demonstrations across the&#160;<a href=\"http://the-sun.com/where/United-States\">United States</a>.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12487867\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Eight cops probed after ‘officers took selfies next to sisters’ dead bodies in park’","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12496584/eight-cops-probed-selfies-next-sisters-dead-bodies/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>EIGHT police officers are under investigation over allegations photos of a murder scene where two sisters were stabbed to death were shared on WhatsApp.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Nicole Smallman, 27, and 46-year-old Bibaa Henry, 46, were found dead at Fryent Country Park, Wembley, north London on June 6, and both suffered multiple stab wounds.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496802\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000593053207.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496802\" width=\"960\" height=\"642\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>Sisters Bibaa Henry (left) and Nicole Smallman, who were stabbed to death a in the early hours of June 6[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>But it later emerged two police officers working on the case had been arrested and were being investigated for misconduct in public office.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Police said it had been informed of allegations of &#8220;non-official and inappropriate photographs&#8221; shared from the murder scene just weeks after the killings.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Both officers, who are based on the North East Command, have been suspended from duty.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Independent Office for Police Conduct, who conducted the arrests, said the pictures were allegedly shared with a number of others, who the Met are now dealing with.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The IOPC announced a further six Met Police officers are under investigation for misconduct.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The officers arrested are alleged to have been either aware of, or had either separately received or viewed the photographs shared in a closed WhatsApp group, the IOPC said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The further six officers accused for failing to either challenge or report the sharing of these images.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496815\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000588109970.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496815\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>The two sisters were found stabbed to death in Fryent Country Park[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496824\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000590268764.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496824\" width=\"960\" height=\"720\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>Selfies taken by the sisters before their deaths [/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Sal Naseem, IOPC Director for London, said he was &#8220;deeply concerned&#8221; by the details emerging from the investigation.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“The public have a right to expect high standards of professional behaviour from police,&#8221; he said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;These allegations, if true, breach that trust and may point to more serious issues around the organisational culture, which we will also be looking at.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He said the case is a “salient reminder to all police officers to take responsibility for addressing wrongdoing and upholding professional standards in their own ranks.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Officers have an “obligation to speak out if they see unacceptable behaviour”, he added.</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>&#8216;BREACH OF TRUST&#8217;</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Last month Bibaa and Nicole&#8217;s mother, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/11966340/mum-fury-police-selfies-daughters-dead-bodies/\">Mina Smallman, said of the allegations </a>about the photos:  &#8220;This has taken our grief to another place.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;If ever we needed an example of how toxic it has become, those police officers felt so safe, so untouchable, that they felt they could take photographs of dead black girls and send them on.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;It speaks volumes of the ethos that runs through the Metropolitan Police.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div hitting one, as they were making their way from Milwaukee to Washington, DC.</p>\n<p>Activist Frank Nitty documented the shooting on Monday on social media, when he and the group he was with were stopped in a <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/where/pennsylvania/\">Pennsylvania</a> town during the cross-country demonstration. </p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12496375\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 228px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604051259.png?strip=all&#38;w=218\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496375\" width=\"218\" height=\"287\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">A man holding what appears to be a rifle can be seen in the footage</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12496374\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 226px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604051258.png?strip=all&#38;w=216\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496374\" width=\"216\" height=\"289\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Protesters can be seen scattering into nearby cars in the video</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p>Nitty&#8217;s live-streamed video shows he and other marchers walking on what appears to be a residential street when gun shots ring out. </p>\n<p>The shooting went down as <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/topic/black-lives-matter/\">BLM</a> protesters were passing through Schellsburg, Pennsylvania, <a href=\"https://www.post-gazette.com/news/crime-courts/2020/08/25/Protest-marcher-shot-bedford-county-pennsylvania-frank-nitty/stories/202008250075\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">according to the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette</a>. </p>\n<p>The video is a bit hard to follow, but demonstrators can be seen scattering and making their way into nearby cars. One protester can be seen bleeding from the face.</p>\n<p>At one point, the camera points at a house across the road where two men can be seen staring at the group. One is holding a long object, that appears to be a rifle.</p>\n<p>It&#8217;s unclear at this time if any arrests have been made in the shooting, but the Post-Gazette reported that Pennsylvania State Police are investigating. </p>\n<p>Local station <a href=\"https://pittsburgh.cbslocal.com/2020/08/25/man-in-protest-walk-from-milwaukee-to-washington-d-c-reportedly-injured-in-shooting-near-johnstown/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">KDKA reported</a> that one person was injured in the shooting and is in the hospital in stable condition. </p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-news\" data-slide-count=\"4\" relation to the incident, the station reported.</p>\n<p>Nitty is reportedly walking 30 miles a day on the way to DC with his group, and stopping in cities along the way to engage in protests and other calls for justice.</p>\n<p>The Post-Gazette reported that the group was hoping to make it to DC by August 28, to attend an anniversary event for Dr Martin Luther King Jr&#8217;s I Have a Dream speech. +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604051259.png?strip=all&w=218","linkMd5":"c5955e18319754c246772f5a3c6a0a0e","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn32@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-46-57-054_cb85496df4e4a984.webp","destWidth":218,"destHeight":287,"sourceBytes":73507,"destBytes":4734,"author":"Laura run?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/12495330/coronation-street-todd-leave-on-the-run/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>CORONATION Street’s Craig Tinker dropped the bombshell last night that Todd Grimshaw is no longer being hunted for by the police.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The legal assistant fled from the cobbles after assaulting a police officer &#8211; and his friends and family assumed he was still on the run. So what’s the real reason Todd has been keeping away from Weatherfield?</p>\n\n\n\n<ul><li><strong>Visit our <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/coronation-street/\">Coronation Street</a> page for the latest gossip </strong></li><li><strong>Find all <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/emmerdale-spoilers/\">Coronation Street spoilers</a> here</strong></li></ul>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495603\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000600334700-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495603\" width=\"960\" height=\"542\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Craig revealed Todd is no longer being hunted for by the police</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<h2>Why did Todd leave Corrie and go on the run?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>The drama began when lovebirds Todd and Billy Mayhew became embroiled in a custody battle in 2017 with their adopted daughter Summer’s grandmother, Geraldine.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Billy and Todd eventually ran away with Summer to keep her away from the evil granny. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>But Peter Barlow put a spanner in the works by abducting Billy and threatening to throw him off a cliff as payback for his role in the death of his twin sister Susan.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Adam later found a letter from Todd saying he had left Weatherfield to protect Summer.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But Summer returned in January 2018 without Todd and explained that he’d gone on the run from the police after assaulting a police officer.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But of course, viewers know that Todd’s off-screen exit was really to facilitate actor Bruno Langley’s departure after he was <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12104864/coronation-street-recast-todd-grimshaw-bruno-langley-axed/\">axed from the soap</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495614\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 648px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/0f633ac3-4380-4b16-aa95-250a7796f4b7.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=638\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495614\" width=\"638\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>Corrie fans want to know the real reason Todd has remained on the run[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>Why has Todd stayed on the run in Corrie?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Fans were left baffled by Craig’s bombshell and confused why Todd is still on the run if he isn’t being hunted for by the police.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>One fan tweeted: “Where&#8217;s Todd &#38; why exactly hasn&#8217;t he been in touch with Eileen before now? Does she even know he&#8217;s already been questioned/released by the Police?<a href=\"https://twitter.com/hashtag/Corrie?src=hashtag_click\"> #Corrie</a>”</p>\n\n\n\n<div class=\"oembed-container oembed-twitter\"><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet\" data-width=\"550\" data-dnt=\"true\"><p lang=\"en\" dir=\"ltr\">Where&#39;s Todd &#38; why exactly hasn&#39;t he been in touch with Eileen before now? Does she even know he&#39;s already been questioned/released by the Police? <a href=\"https://twitter.com/hashtag/Corrie?src=hash&#38;ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">#Corrie</a> <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f914.png\" alt=\"🤔\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /></p>&#8212; Grianne Doherty (@GrianneDoherty1) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/GrianneDoherty1/status/1297981312897294336?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">August 24, 2020</a></blockquote><script async src=\"https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script></div>\n\n\n\n<div class=\"oembed-container oembed-twitter\"><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet\" data-width=\"550\" data-dnt=\"true\"><p lang=\"en\" dir=\"ltr\"><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f644.png\" alt=\"🙄\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" />so something bad must&#39;ve happened just because Todd hasn&#39;t contacted Eileen?! <br>smh Sean is a prat<img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f623.png\" alt=\"😣\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /><br>maybe Todd has been in contact with Eileen who&#39;s kept it to herself, it is her business after all!<a href=\"https://twitter.com/hashtag/Corrie?src=hash&#38;ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">#Corrie</a></p>&#8212; Jehan (@1stLadyHooligan) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/1stLadyHooligan/status/1297973201503498250?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">August 24, 2020</a></blockquote><script async src=\"https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script></div>\n\n\n\n<p>Might Todd have got himself into more trouble?</p>\n\n\n\n<p>With Corrie keeping shtum, fans will have to tune in to find out.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495602\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000601111624-2.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495602\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>Gareth Pierce will be taking over the role of Todd in Corrie[/caption]\n\n\n\n<h2>Does Craig know where Todd is in Corrie?</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Coronation Street are yet to confirm why Todd is still on the run in Corrie, but fans are convinced Craig knows more than he’s letting on.&#160;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>One fan tweeted: “Craig&#8217;s hiding something. Does he know where Todd is? #Corrie.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Another added: “<a href=\"https://twitter.com/hashtag/Corrie?src=hashtag_click\">#Corrie</a> so why does Craig seem so guilty about the Todd mystery?”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A third viewer said: “Craig definitely knows something about Todd #Corrie.”</p>\n\n\n\n<div class=\"oembed-container oembed-twitter\"><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet\" data-width=\"550\" data-dnt=\"true\"><p lang=\"en\" dir=\"ltr\"><a href=\"https://twitter.com/hashtag/Corrie?src=hash&#38;ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">#Corrie</a> so why does Craig seem so guilty about the Todd mystery? <img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f575-fe0f-200d-2642-fe0f.png\" alt=\"🕵️‍♂️\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" /></p>&#8212; Marie Holt (@MarieHolt50) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/MarieHolt50/status/1297970587525156865?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">August 24, 2020</a></blockquote><script async src=\"https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script></div>\n\n\n\n<div class=\"oembed-container oembed-twitter\"><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet\" data-width=\"550\" data-dnt=\"true\"><p lang=\"en\" dir=\"ltr\">Craig&#39;s hiding something. will play Todd in Corrie?</strong></h2>\n\n\n\n<p>It has been confirmed that <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/12358634/coronation-street-todd-grimshaw-gareth-pierce-bruno-langley/\">actor Gareth Pierce will take over the role</a> three years after Bruno Langley was axed.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>New soap star Gareth said: &#8220;I’m thrilled to be joining such an iconic show, and to have been entrusted with taking Todd forward into some really exciting storylines.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;It’s an honour to be part of the dedicated Coronation Street team in such unprecedented times.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n<div></div>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 14:49:10 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000600334700-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"e013fe091358e2eac800d89d3bad6d35","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn11@2020_1/2020/08/25/16-46-57-281_9d5a4cbd1b841c4f.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":542,"sourceBytes":124382,"destBytes":124382,"author":"Molly Moss","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000600334700-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn11@2020_1/2020/08/25/16-46-57-281_9d5a4cbd1b841c4f.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/0f633ac3-4380-4b16-aa95-250a7796f4b7.jpg?strip=all&w=638":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn23@2020_1/2020/08/25/16-47-09-654_ca304ef501e81006.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f914.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn60@2020_5/2020/08/25/16-47-14-404_96c7548b96165bdd.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f644.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn67@2020_6/2020/08/25/16-47-08-114_e9c41ae80dcb79c7.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f623.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn80@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-47-02-139_cfef0cbb7167210b.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000601111624-2.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn28@2020_1/2020/08/25/16-47-01-523_0411e73d8a68b794.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f575-fe0f-200d-2642-fe0f.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn44@2020_6/2020/08/25/16-47-02-511_1722ee48aa0da642.webp","https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/1f495.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn95@2020_2/2020/08/25/16-47-02-412_48853560390f2ebf.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016690},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Starbucks Eat Out to Help Out prices include a latte or cappuccino for £1.40","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12292588/starbucks-eat-out-help-out-prices/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>STARBUCKS customers will be able to pick up a latte or cappuccino for £1.40 as part of the Eat Out to Help Out scheme.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>The coffee chain has confirmed its food and drink will be discounted by 50 per cent in the majority of its stores.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12292816\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 676px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Screenshot-2020-08-02-at-13.21.44.png?strip=all&#38;w=666\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12292816\" width=\"666\" height=\"454\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">A latte from Starbucks will cost £1.38 on days when Eat Out to Help Out applies</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Although there are a minority of branches not taking part in the scheme.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>We are checking with Starbucks how many branches have opted out and will update this article when we know more.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It means a small latte or cappuccino will cost £1.38 instead of £2.76.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>If you fancy something cooling, a small caramel frappuccino will come to £1.92 rather than £3.84.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>As food is also being discounted, an all day breakfast roll &#8211; containing scrambled eggs, pork sausages and smoked bacon in a crusty roll &#8211; will cost £4.32 instead of £2.16.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A sweet treat, such as a blueberry muffin, will be reduced to £1.19 from £2.38.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12293055\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/MB-COMP-GRAPHIC-TABLE-STARBUCKS.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12293055\" width=\"960\" height=\"877\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Examples of Starbucks Eat Out to Help Out prices</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>You can see more examples of <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/starbucks/\">Starbucks</a> discounts in the box above.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Keep in mind these discounts only apply on days when the <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12074850/eat-out-help-out-voucher-scheme-revealed-rules/\">Eat Out to Help Out</a> deal is on.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Prices will also vary slightly depending on your location &#8211; but you&#8217;ll still get 50 per cent off the original cost up to to a maximum of £10 per person.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12243260/eat-out-to-help-out-scheme-full-list-food-chains/\">Eat Out to Help Out</a> sees diners get half price meals and non-alcoholic drinks, up to £10 a head, in restaurants, cafes and pubs throughout August.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It launches on August 3 and will run until August 31, with the discount applying on Mondays, Tuesdays and Wednesdays.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Businesses don’t have to sign up to the scheme.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<div class=\"article-boxout\">\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\">\n\t\t\t<h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">How will the Eat Out to Help Out scheme work?</h3>\n\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t<p class=\"article__content--intro\">\n\t\t\t\t\tTHE government will cover half of the cost of a meal out, up to £10 a head, including children&#039;s meals.\t\t\t\t</p>\n\t\t\t\n\t\t\t<div>\n<p>The discount means that a meal out for one that costs £20 will be reduced to £10, but a £25 meal for one will be slashed to £15 because of the £10 cap per person.</p>\n<p>There is no limit to the number of times you can use the discount, so in theory you can get half price meals on every Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday in August.</p>\n<p>Businesses will need to register with the scheme on Gov.uk before being able to offer the discount, as well as be Food Standards Agency approved.</p>\n<p>Instead of issuing discount&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12053989/voucher-schemes-restaurants-green-homes/\">vouchers</a>&#160;&#8211; which the government felt increased the risk of fraud &#8211; restaurants, cafes and pubs will be able to claim back the cash.</p>\n<p>The refund will then been transferred into restaurants, cafes and pubs&#8217; bank accounts within five working days.</p>\n<p>Customers will only receive the discount if they eat out at a registered business.</p>\n<p>The government has just launched a&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12235205/eat-out-to-help-out-postcode-checker/\">new postcode checker</a>&#160;so you can see all the businesses that will be offering the scheme.</p>\n</div>\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n\t\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12129996/costa-starbucks-vat-cut-slash-food-drink-prices/\">Starbucks has already slashed prices</a> after it decided to pass on lower costs to customers following a cut in VAT.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Chancellor <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/rishi-sunak/\">Rishi Sunak</a>&#160;announced he was&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/money/12072759/vat-reduction-tax-cut-new-rate-start/\">slashing VAT for businesses in the hospitality industry</a> from 20 per cent to 5 per cent.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Sun has asked Starbucks if everything on their menu will be discounted as part of Eat Out to Help Out and we&#8217;ll update this article when we know more.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>We&#8217;re also checking how many branches are now offering dine-in, as the discounts won&#8217;t apply for takeaway customers.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Starbucks has around 995 in the UK &#8211; use the <a href=\"https://www.starbucks.co.uk/store-locator?map=53.380052,-1.469421,7z\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\">online store finder</a> to track down your nearest branch.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail rail--classic  rail--trending theme-money\" data-slide-count=\"4\" data-slide-count-tablet=\"4\">\t\t\t\t<div class=\"swiper-container\">\n\n\t\t\t\t\t<div girl.</p>\n<p>Experts say that the pneumonia that led to the girl&#8217;s death was caused by an injury sustained at the hands of Abitz, according to the Fond du Lac County District Attorney Eric Toney.</p>\n<p>Toney told the judge on Monday: &#8220;The abusive head trauma resulted in significant impairment for the victim moving forward with multiple bouts of pneumonia over the course of years.</p>\n<p>&#8220;And then in 2017 the victim passed away from pneumonia which was linked to the abusive head trauma by the medical examiner, Dr. Kelley; Dr. Coller, the treating pediatrician; as well as Dr. Knox, who was the original child abuse expert physician.&#8221;</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12496049\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 180px\"><img hit her head against a wall, <a href=\"https://www.wbay.com/2020/08/24/fond-du-lac-man-convicted-of-child-abuse-now-charged-with-homicide-in-victims-death/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer sentence. </p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604045950.jpg?strip=all&w=300","linkMd5":"14a6db7cb9eeeaaeddd8cd1c8720e86f","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn51@2020_5/2020/08/25/16-46-57-011_a8796e1e0ab45959.webp","destWidth":300,"destHeight":377,"sourceBytes":5152,"destBytes":5152,"author":"Mollie 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Lionel Messi to ‘officially announce transfer plans in next few days’ as Man City and Inter fight for Barcelona star","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12495085/lionel-messi-future-transfer-reveal-barcelona/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>LIONEL MESSI has reportedly made his mind up and will soon tell Barcelona whether he will stay or go.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Manchester City, Paris Saint-Germain and Inter Milan are circling with intent ahead of the biggest decision in the striker&#8217;s career.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495340\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/crop-12495338.jpg?strip=all\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone wp-image-12495340\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>AFP OR LICENSORS</figcredit></figure>Lionel Messi is set to reveal his future plans in the coming days[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>In over 15 years in the Blaugrana first-team, the 33-year-old has never appeared as likely to leave the club as he does now.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The turmoil sparked by Barcelona&#8217;s shocking 8-2 defeat to Bayern Munich in the Champions League could be about to send Messi out of the exit door.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Big questions are being asked of the direction of the club with the South American only tied to a one-year contract.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And Argentine outlet <a href=\"https://twitter.com/DiarioOle/status/1298198605468250113/photo/1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noreferrer noopener\">Diario Ole</a> report that Messi has made a decision on his future, which will be communicated to the LaLiga giants in the coming days.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Barcelona are due back for pre-season training next Monday but one of the striker&#8217;s best pals is not set to stay much longer.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>New coach Ronald Koeman has reportedly told Luis Suarez <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12491242/luis-suarez-barcelona-exit-koeman/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">he is no longer needed at the Camp Nou</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<script type=\"application/javascript\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/pollingwidgets/v3/widget.js?question_id=2792&#038;game=polling\"></script>\n\n\n\n<p>The manner of his exit is said to have upset the Uruguayan forward, who has already <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12471049/furious-luis-suarez-barcelona-board-transfer-ajax/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">fired a barb in the direction of under-fire club president Josep Maria Bartomeu</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Any further sign that Messi wants out would send the Catalans into meltdown, amid calls for Bartomeu to resign.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Manchester City are thought to be <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12489576/man-city-lionel-messi-afford/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">weighing up a contract offer</a> and whether he would breach their Financial Fair Play spending allowance.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Meanwhile, former Inter owner Massimo Moratti <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12490730/inter-milan-lionel-messi-transfer-barcelona-owner/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">reckons his old club are keen to bring the forward to Milan</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12422752\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/RR-SPORTS-TABLE-MESSI.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12422752\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Man City are the favourites to sign Messi this summer</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">would be &#8220;very welcome&#8221;</a> to replace outgoing forward Eric Maxim Choupo-Moting in his PSG squad.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Talks between Messi and Barcelona are understood to have taken place after the star <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12455321/messi-barcelona-koeman-talks-captaincy/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">cut short his Pyrenees holiday to meet Koeman</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Dutchman has already admitted a degree of nervousness over his talisman&#8217;s future &#8211; <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12455321/messi-barcelona-koeman-talks-captaincy/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">stating that he &#8220;doesn&#8217;t know&#8221; if he can convince Messi to stay</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<div class=\"wp-block-group\"><div class=\"wp-block-group__inner-container\">\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<h2><a -->\n\n\t\t\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 14:26:05 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/crop-12495338.jpg?strip=all","linkMd5":"c3066e74ce979c1291c08559a44219e3","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn96@2020_2/2020/08/25/16-46-57-264_23a4a8d994a91ecf.webp","destWidth":1393,"destHeight":928,"sourceBytes":78178,"destBytes":78178,"author":"Marc Mayo","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/crop-12495338.jpg?strip=all":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn96@2020_2/2020/08/25/16-46-57-264_23a4a8d994a91ecf.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/RR-SPORTS-TABLE-MESSI.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn91@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-47-10-288_5a9488ff930bb528.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/KH-SPORT-GRAPHIC-LIONEL-MESSI-TROPHY-v4.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn72@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-47-07-224_30f0d218dcb9895e.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016699},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Kim Jong-un dead rumours – White House official ‘burst into laughter’ when he heard about tyrant’s coma claims","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12495624/kim-jong-un-dead-white-house-laughter-coma/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>A WHITE House official burst out laughing when quizzed about claims that Kim Jong-un is in a coma or dead, a North Korea expert has said. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Speculation about the health of the despot has been rife since he retreated from public view in April, and began again this week after a former South Korean official claimed he was in a coma. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496302\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603033560.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496302\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>EPA</figcredit></figure>Fresh rumours in recent days have suggested that Kim Jong-un is in a coma[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496306\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603033433.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496306\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>EPA</figcredit></figure>Photos purportedly taken on August 19 show Kim addressing a meeting of senior North Korea officials[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The 36-year-old has been seen in public only a handful of times since reportedly undergoing heart surgery in April. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Photos released recently by North Korea&#8217;s state media have shown him attending meetings with senior officials, although questions have been raised about their authenticity. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Speaking to local media, Chang Song-min, a former aide to late South Korean president Kim Dae-Jung, said he believed figures within the regime were trying to conceal a decline in Kim Jong-un&#8217;s health. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>“I assess him to be in a coma, but his life has not ended,&#8221; he said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But taking to twitter yesterday, Harry Kazianis, a senior director at the Center for the National Interest, a conservative think tank based in Washington, said: &#160;&#8220;I spoke to a White House [official] this AM on the news #KimJongUn was in a coma or dead. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;The [official] bust out into laughter. I think we all need to move on.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Comparisons of commercially-available satellite images with reference points in footage showing Kim on recent public outings also suggest the footage is genuine, <a href=\"https://www.nknews.org/2020/08/is-kim-jong-un-in-a-coma-again-will-kim-yo-jong-take-over-heres-what-we-know/\">NK News</a> reports. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Video broadcast on North Korean state media purportedly shows Kim appearing at the Sixth Plenary Meeting of the 7th Central Committee of the Workers’ Party of Korea on August 19.</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>SUCCESSION PLAN</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>Sung-Yoon Lee, a professor at Tufts University’s Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy, has also said the coma claims are false, but added that steps appear to be being taken within the regime to ensure a successor is in place in the event of Kim&#8217;s death. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>A number of possible replacements have been cited, but his younger sister, Kim Yo Jong, 32, is currently seen as the frontrunner.  </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Speaking to the New York Post, Lee said: &#8220;Clearly there has been a contingency plan rolled out since early March to bolster Kim Yo Jong’s credentials and have her, if and when necessary, to seize the reins of power should Kim Jong Un become incapacitated.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Kim Yo Jong has frequently been seen alongside her brother over the last year and has also made a number of public statements, most notably reiterated his threats against the United States. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Lee added that Kim Yo Jong was &#8220;ambitious and smart&#8221; but that the nature of the role would demand &#8220;she be ruthless, especially in the first few years.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“The way for her to build up her credibility and net worth, that is, the way for her to get respect, is not to play nice but be a cruel dictator to her people and a credible nuclear threat to the US,” he said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“She may prove herself fiercer and more tyrannical than her brother, father, or grandfather.”</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col -->\n\t</div><!-- .sun-row .{row} .rail-video-index-->\n\t</div> <!-- .sun-grid-container .sun-grid-container--{color} -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>North Korea is known to be pursuing a nuclear weapons programme, and talks between the regime and the Trump administration have so far failed to produce any agreement on disarmament.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Another possible successor is Kim Pyong II, uncle to the siblings, who returned to the country in 2019 after spending years working as a diplomat in Europe.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496347\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000579589192-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image
