successor, is thought to have undergone a heart operation in April[/caption]\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 15:49:29 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603033560.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"edc082fe070cc53e548f4de925a15d3d","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn52@2020_1/2020/08/25/16-46-58-058_222b9e1a41f3fed1.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":640,"sourceBytes":98962,"destBytes":98962,"author":"Christy Cooney","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603033560.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn52@2020_1/2020/08/25/16-46-58-058_222b9e1a41f3fed1.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603033433.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn68@2020_6/2020/08/25/16-47-12-651_8c80b485382757f2.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000579589192-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn19@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-47-09-703_55c11038ed0c5832.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016664},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Parents warned about deadly drug-laced ‘sweets’ disguised as Nerds candy and pedalled to teens online","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12486462/cops-kids-drugs-sweets-yorkshire-drugs/","description":"<p><b>PARENTS are being warned about deadly drug-laced &#8220;sweets&#8221; being disguised as Nerds candy. </b></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The &#8220;Nerd Rope&#8221; sweets – infused with cannabis and ecstasy – look very similar to the popular children’s treats but contain a “super potent blend” of drugs.</span></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12487099\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-12487099 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/nerds-raid-July-2-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" width=\"960\" height=\"796\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Shocking images show the cannabis-laced Nerds ropes seized by cops in a drugs bust last month</figcaption><figcredit>West Yorkshire Police</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">They are being peddled to youngsters online by teenage dealers – as part of a worrying new “edibles” trend where drugs are disguised as sweets.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">After a brief search, the Sun Online found websites selling &#8220;medicated&#8221; Nerds with up to 6000mg of cannabis.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The brightly coloured sweets come in four flavours with different drug strengths and could easily be mistaken for the normal sweets. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The illegal Nerds Ropes could be bought online, from sites with no proper checks or age restrictions, for £42 a pack.</span></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12487137\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 781px\"><img class=\"wp-image-12487137 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Nerds-online-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=771\" alt=\"\" width=\"771\" height=\"651\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The SunOnline found websites peddling the drugged &#8220;sweets&#8221; containing up to 6000MG of cannabis</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">It raises concerns kids could easily purchase the drugs, with cops warning against the dangers.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">North Yorkshire PC Lauren Green said: “We want to make parents and carers aware that we have seen a rise in young people being in possession of drug-infused sweets known as “edibles”.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">“They can look very similar to well-known sweets such as Haribo, Smarties and </span><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">chocolate bars. Edibles can be laced with illegal drugs such as cannabis and MDMA.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">“Unregulated sweets like these are dangerous as we don’t know what levels of drugs they contain.</span></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12486485\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img class=\"wp-image-12486485 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Nerds-august.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"nerds drugs\" width=\"960\" height=\"566\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Yorkshire cops discovered more &#8216;sweets&#8217; labelled as containing cannabis in their latest drugs spike on Friday</figcaption><figcredit>North Yorkshire Police</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">“They are available to buy on the internet and so could easily be obtained by young </span><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">people, especially at this time when they are using the internet more than ever due to the coronavirus restrictions.”</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Police issued further warnings urging parents to stay alert after officers seized drugs and weapons in a major Yorkshire raid on Friday</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Officers stormed three Harrogate premises on August 21 and confiscated Nerds labelled as containing cannabis along with cash, mobile phones, drugs and weapons.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">A North Yorkshire Police spokesperson said: “[Police] seized what they suspect as cannabis infused Nerd sweets and are warning parents to be alert to the possibility that young people in the area may have bought them.”</span></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12486470\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 635px\"><img class=\"wp-image-12486470 size-thesun-article-image\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/July-Nerds-raid.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=625\" alt=\"\" width=\"625\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The shocking stash of illegal &#8216;candy&#8217; was seized by Bradford cops in July</figcaption><figcredit>West Yorkshire Police</figcredit></figure></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The raids were carried as part of Operation Needle, formed to crack down on drug dealing in the Yorkshire town. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">Two men aged 18 and 24 and three boys &#8211; two aged 17 and one 16-year-old &#8211; were arrested in connection with the incidents.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The 24-year-old man was arrested on suspicion </span><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">of being concerned in the supply of class A drugs, being concerned in the supply of cannabis and money laundering.</span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">The news comes after Bradford police seized large amounts of cannabis-infused Nerds sweets last month, along with high-tech packaging equipment. </span></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-weight: 400\">And in early July, a teenage girl was rushed to hospital in Castleford after feasting on a Nerds Rope laced with amphetamine. </span></p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container Wakefield District Police said: &#8220;Although this is an isolated case, we want to warn teenagers and parents of the dangers of taking laced ‘Nerd Rope’.</p>\n<p>&#8220;It may look like a sweet but taking it could be dangerous and not to mention it is illegal.</p>\n<p>&#8220;We are working with our partners and youth services to raise awareness of this drug and to educate our youngsters on the Graffius","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/nerds-raid-July-2-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn100@2020_3/2020/08/25/16-46-57-015_c7a339af76cfb297.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Nerds-online-1.jpg?strip=all&w=771":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn20@2020_6/2020/08/25/16-47-10-737_29d51acb54cbb0c4.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/Nerds-august.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn36@2020_3/2020/08/25/16-47-14-850_e285bc1d99719c30.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/July-Nerds-raid.jpg?strip=all&w=625":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn23@2020_3/2020/08/25/16-47-07-759_96d816a9e2205490.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016697},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Boris Johnson rubbishes ‘nonsense’ claims he will quit in 6 months and says he’s feeling better after losing 1.5 stone","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12491647/boris-nonsense-quit-cummings-weight-loss/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>BORIS Johnson has rubbished &#8220;nonsense&#8221; claims he will quit in 6 months because of his ill-health from his battle with coronavirus. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The PM said he was feeling &#8220;far better&#8221; than ever after losing 1.5 stone after a report claimed chief adviser Dominic Cummings&#8217; father-in-law had told a journalist he would resign. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495756\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604028403-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495756\" width=\"960\" height=\"639\"/><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>No10 said it was &#8220;utter nonsense&#8221; Boris Johnson would be resigning[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12493683\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604022267.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12493683\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\"/><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>The PM visited Appledore Shipyard in Devon which will reopen after it was bought by InfraStrata[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>During a visit to Appledore Shipyard in North Devon the PM addressed the rumours, telling Devon Live: &#8220;It&#8217;s absolute nonsense! I am feeling, if anything, far better as I&#8217;ve lost some weight. Not enough, but I have lost at least a stone and a half.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;I feel much much better for having lost, by my standards, quite a lot of weight.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The report by&#160;<a href=\"https://www.thetimes.co.uk/edition/news/putting-pm-out-to-stud-mtzzfdvh0\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\">The Times diary column</a> claimed chief adviser <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/who/dominic-cummings/\">Dominic Cummings</a>&#8216; father-in-law suggested that the PM was ready to step down because of the toll coronavirus has taken on him. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The rumours cited journalist Anna Silverman, who had visited Chillingham Castle in Northumberland, which is home to Sir Humphry Wakefield, the father of Mr Cummings&#8217; wife Mary.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Sir Humphry apparently &#8220;merrily&#8221; told Ms Silverman that Mr Johnson is &#8220;still struggling badly with having had Covid-19&#8221; and &#8220;will stand down in six months&#8221;. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;If you put a horse back to work when it&#8217;s injured it will never recover,&#8221; it reported him as saying.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But the extraordinary claims have been laughed off by Downing Street. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>A No10 spokesperson told The Sun: &#8220;This is nonsense&#8221;. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The PM was admitted to the intensive care unit at <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/11342758/boris-johnson-best-possible-hands-st-thomas-medics-coronavirus/\">St Thomas&#8217; Hospital in London in April after he became sick with the virus</a>.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Health Secretary Matt Hancock and Chief Medical Officer Professor Chris Whitty were also infected but neither needed hospitalisation.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Mr Johnson was <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/11381122/inside-story-boris-coronavirus-battle/\">given &#8220;oxygen treatment&#8221; and spent three days in intensive care</a> with the nation on tenterhooks as to whether he would make it.</p>\n\n\n\n<script type=\"application/javascript\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/pollingwidgets/v3/widget.js?question_id=2882&#038;game=polling\"></script>\n\n\n\n<p>He was the first major world leader to come down with the virus, and appeared to suffer with it badly.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He later blamed his weight as being a factor in why he was sick &#8211; and urged the nation to follow him on a health kick.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Obesity has been flagged as a <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12233916/boris-johnson-fat-obesity/\">major risk factor for the virus.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>In a video following his discharge from hospital, Mr Johnson thanked health service staff for saving his life.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He said the NHS had &#8220;saved his life&#8221;. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>He&#8217;s just returned from a week&#8217;s holiday in Scotland <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12473675/boris-johnson-hiking-wilfred-scotland-holiday-carrie-symonds/\">with partner Carrie and their newborn son, Wilfred.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>Boris is back at his desk this week getting Britain&#8217;s schools ready to reopen on Monday.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Today he was snapped on a business visit in Devon.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But it was reported Mr Cummings has been off work to have an operation he delayed when he agreed to become the PM&#8217;s advisor last year.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He is expected to return to work next Monday.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495693\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 426px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603488636-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=416\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495693\" width=\"416\" height=\"491\"/><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The PM hiking in Scotland last week with his newborn son Wilfred</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495690\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604028246.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495690\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\"/><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>Boris looked fit and well today on a visit to a business[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491915\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000594171085.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491915\" width=\"960\" height=\"707\"/><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alamy Live News</figcredit></figure>Dominic Cummings&#8217; father-in-law is said to be behind the reports[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491908\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000576701683.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491908\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\"/><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alamy Live News</figcredit></figure>Boris Johnson, pictured after he was discharged from hospital[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>He applauded the work of two nurses Mr Johnson said stayed at his side for 48 hours “when things could have gone either way.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The PM spent <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/11386212/boris-johnson-chequers-carrie-lockdown/\">some time at Chequers with fiancé Carrie</a> after his stint in hospital. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Mr Cummings&#8217;, the PM&#8217;s chief adviser, was <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/11695331/dominic-cummings-second-time-lockdown-trip/\">the centre of an uproar when he was accused of breaking lockdown rules </a>when he and his wife drove from London to Durham. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Mr Cummings has been ridiculed after claiming he took at trip to tourist destination Barnard Castle to &#8220;test his eyes&#8221;. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495701\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 492px\"><img -->\n\n\t\t\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 15:34:00 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604028403-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"6860b34d55c6c16368c10a7cb26167fe","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn24@2020_6/2020/08/25/16-46-57-689_38770c9b3b1d028d.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":639,"sourceBytes":230774,"destBytes":230774,"author":"Sascha O'Sullivan","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604028403-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn24@2020_6/2020/08/25/16-46-57-689_38770c9b3b1d028d.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604022267.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn84@2020_2/2020/08/25/16-47-10-315_7a0bf5f85a11e1dd.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603488636-1.jpg?strip=all&w=416":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn4@2020_2/2020/08/25/16-47-08-807_8775b80cae3f0a7c.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604028246.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn11@2020_2/2020/08/25/16-47-10-605_bf91473993342ed8.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000594171085.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn7@2020_5/2020/08/25/16-47-05-549_79f42d4e75798ca6.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000576701683.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn64@2020_6/2020/08/25/16-47-13-734_ab86a0512cdda023.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603488465-1.jpg?strip=all&w=482":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn75@2020_3/2020/08/25/16-47-13-766_455954314f4722dc.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016682},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Elton John’s wife Renate Blauel ‘took an overdose 3 days into St Tropez honeymoon after he said marriage wasn’t working’","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12494380/elton-john-wife-renate-blauel-overdose-claims/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>ELTON John&#8217;s wife Renate Blauel took an overdose three days into their St Tropez honeymoon, court documents revealed today.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>Renate, who was married to Sir Elton between 1984 and 1988, claimed she took Valium tablets after he said the marriage wasn&#8217;t working.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12494953\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 913px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604036650.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=903\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12494953\" width=\"903\" height=\"825\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Paramount</figcredit></figure>Court documents have claimed Renate Blauel overdosed on tablets during her honeymoon with Sir Elton John[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12494964\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000485678559.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12494964\" width=\"960\" height=\"641\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Hulton Archive - Getty</figcredit></figure>The pair were married between 1984 and 1988[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12494988\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 578px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/a226bc56-9e7a-4505-a875-33ae167a3e3b.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=568\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12494988\" width=\"568\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Rex Features</figcredit></figure>Renate is seeking £3million damages claim against the 73-year-old over his public discussion of their marriage[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>She was rushed to hospital to have her stomach pumped.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Renate claimed Sir Elton did not visit her, and that his assistant drove her to the airport with her luggage straight from the hospital. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>The bombshell claims emerged today in documents filed at the High Court by Renate, 67, as part of her £3million damages claim against the 73-year-old over his public discussion of their marriage.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The former couple allegedly agreed to not discuss their marriage in public following their split. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>Renate said she had sought to live a quiet life in privacy after being married the music superstar.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Sir Elton has denied knowing she was susceptible to mental health problems and claims that nothing he has said was in breach of their agreement.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Renate, who is being is being represented by Adam Wolanski QC, claims Sir Elton knew of her struggles with &#8220;depression and anxiety&#8221; &#8211; citing her alleged suicide attempt and an anxiety attack in front of the Queen Mother and Princess Margaret.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Today it was claimed: &#8220;The defendant knew that the claimant had attempted to commit suicide during their marriage.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Approximately five to six months after their wedding, the claimant and the defendant went on their honeymoon to a villa near to St Tropez.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;They were joined on the trip by Bob Halley &#8211; the defendant&#8217;s personal assistant who stayed in the honeymoon property with the couple &#8211; and John Reid, who was staying at a nearby villa.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Three days into the honeymoon, and without any forewarning, the defendant told the claimant that the marriage was not working and that he wanted her to leave the property and return to England.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It is claimed Renate became &#8220;extremely upset&#8221; and got the tablets from Mr Halley&#8217;s luggage.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She then wrote a note to the defendant before taking the reported overdose and being found by Mr Halley, according to court documents.</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>BOMBSHELL CLAIMS</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>The claim continues: &#8220;He alerted the defendant, who became extremely angry. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Mr Halley then drove the Claimant to a hospital in St Tropez where she had her stomach pumped. The defendant did not visit her during her two-day stay in hospital.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Upon being discharged and, it is to be inferred, on the instructions of the defendant, Mr Halley met the claimant at the hospital with her luggage and drove her straight to the airport where she boarded a flight back to London.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;After approximately one to two weeks, she was permitted to re-join the defendant on the honeymoon.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It is claimed Renate sought help from a Harley Street psychiatrist and was given medication, but struggled during the marriage with anxiety.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In or about 1985, the former couple hosted a lunch for members of the Royal family including the late Queen Mother, Princess Margaret and Prince Andrew, according to court documents.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It said: &#8220;During this visit, Princess Margaret asked the claimant about a painting belonging to the defendant. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;The claimant was unable to recall any details about the painting and this caused her to panic and become very anxious.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;She interrupted the defendant’s conversation with the Queen Mother to ask for assistance before removing herself to another room.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Although she did not explain to the defendant why she had done this, it must have been obvious to him that she had absented herself because of her anxiety.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Elton met German-born sound engineer Renate in 1983 while working on his Too Low for Zero album.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>They were married at a star-studded ceremony in Sydney, Australia, in February 1984, but divorced in 1988.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Renate is said to have gone through a lot of effort to have a private life including buying a new home in a friend&#8217;s name and telling everyone she was leaving the country when she was staying in the UK.</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>&#8216;WARM AND FRIENDLY&#8217;</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>In earlier court papers it was claimed that following the release of the &#8216;Rocketman&#8217; movie, Renate had found herself back in the public eye due to renewed interest in her.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It was said: &#8220;She has, since the release of the film, suffered recurring nightmares, agoraphobia, anxiety, depression, fear, and has had to relive her past constantly.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In defence papers, Sir Elton&#8217;s barrister Colin West QC says the singer denies breaching the terms of the divorce agreement or knowing she was susceptible to mental health issues.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Mr West said Renate had not complained when he spoke about their marriage in the past and correspondence between them since their divorce had previously been &#8220;warm and friendly.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The barrister also said the clause in the divorce agreement could only have been intended to prevent discussion of confidential matters, not common knowledge like Sir Elton&#8217;s sexuality.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He said: &#8220;Given the fact that the defendant is gay has entered the public domain without any breach of the agreement, the reasons for separation have to that extent also entered the public domain without any breach of the agreement and have thereby lost any confidential character they might otherwise have had.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;None of the disclosures about which the claimant complains concern matters which are in fact &#8211; or are any longer &#8211; private and confidential.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He added: &#8220;The defendant has at all times acted with due and proper regard for his former wife&#8217;s feelings, as well as his contractual obligations towards her, notwithstanding the fact that they were divorced over 30 years ago.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The case has not yet reached court.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div class=\"rail__item-sub\">\n\t\t\t\tSheridan Smith &#039;almost died&#039; after Graham Norton humiliated her at the Baftas\t\t\t</span>\n\t\t\t</div><!-- .rail__item-content -->\n\t<div -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t\n\n\n\n<p>In a statement issued separate to court proceedings today, Sir Elton&#8217;s legal counsel Jenny Afia told <a href=\"https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-8662021/Elton-Johns-wife-Renate-Blauel-took-overdose-three-days-honeymoon.html\" rel=\"nofollow\">MailOnline</a> that Sir Elton has always respected Renate&#8217;s privacy and their relationship was respectful for the 30 years following.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She added: &#8220;We also find it baffling that this claim is centred around privacy when at every stage of these proceedings Renate has chosen to file these claims in the public domain (when she could have chosen to keep them confidential) about supposed experiences that happened during their marriage which completely goes against the entire grounds of the case.&#160;&#8220;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;This only goes to show the true purpose of this claim which is to extract a large sum of money from Elton and tarnish his name publicly with falsehoods.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495039\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 664px\"><img Gray","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12496519/tottenham-demarai-gray-jose-mourinho-leicester-transfer-talks/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p><strong>JOSE MOURINHO has reportedly held personal transfer talks with Leicester City star Demarai Gray.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.footballinsider247.com/exclusive-tottenham-open-preliminary-talks-to-sign-leicester-city-star/\">Football Insider</a> claims Tottenham are keen on bringing the winger, 24, to their new stadium this summer after tracking him for some time.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496637\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000524996146.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496637\" width=\"960\" height=\"624\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>Tottenham are keen on signing Leicester winger Demarai Gray[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Mourinho is understood to have held discussions with Gray directly.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>And after featuring in just 21 Premier League games last season, with most of those appearances coming off the bench, Gray is apparently keen on making the switch.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The former Birmingham youngster has entered the final year of his King Power contract.</p>\n\n\n\n<div class=\"wp-block-group\"><div class=\"wp-block-group__inner-container\">\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<h2><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12371286/transfer-news-live-winks-man-city-cristiano-ronaldo-barcelona-spurs-liverpool/\">TRANSFER NEWS LIVE: Breaking news, juicy gossip and the biggest deals</a></h2>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n</div></div>\n\n\n\n<p>And Brendan Rodgers could now sell Gray to avoid losing him for free next summer.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The midfielder has been at Leicester for four-and-a-half years after a £3.7million move from St Andrew’s in January 2016.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Gray has made 167 appearances in total, scoring 13 goals.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Spurs have already made moves in the transfer window, with <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12472760/spurs-ipswich-3-0-hojbjerg-hart-son-sessegnon/\">Pierre-Emile Hojbjerg arriving from Southampton</a> -->\n\n\t\t\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 16:06:12 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000524996146.jpg?strip=all&w=960","linkMd5":"6ef277213a86ae0da4cc584bcc8e8a2d","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn5@2020_6/2020/08/25/16-46-56-931_8eda8217124246c3.webp","destWidth":960,"destHeight":624,"sourceBytes":31238,"destBytes":31238,"author":"Anthony Chapman","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000524996146.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn5@2020_6/2020/08/25/16-46-56-931_8eda8217124246c3.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/LB-SPURS-TOP-FIXTURES.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn3@2020_5/2020/08/25/16-47-06-677_a0c62ffeaf24194f.webp","https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603472821.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn91@2020_3/2020/08/25/16-47-03-942_5896583adf77adc9.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016662},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Talk to Alexa in the car with Echo Auto – now £10 off in Amazon Summer Sale","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tech/12496349/amazon-alexa-echo-auto-offer/","description":"<p><strong>YOU can now talk to Alexa even when you’re in the car thanks to Echo Auto.</strong></p> \n<p>If you haven’t tried the feature already it’s currently avaliable in the Amazon Summer Sale for just £39.99.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12496738\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604058980.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496738\" width=\"960\" height=\"613\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Amazon\n </figcredit>\n</figure>The Amazon UK sale has taken £10 off Echo Auto[/caption] \n<p>Echo Auto actually launched back in June and usually retails at £49.99.</p> \n<p>The feature lets you ask Alexa to play music, give you news updates and make calls all hands free.</p> \n<p>It works through the Alexa app on your smartphone and connects to car speakers via an auxiliary input jack or Bluetooth.</p> \n<p>Once connected up you can ask Alexa to play music from the likes of Spotify or Apple Music in your car.</p> \n<figure id=\"attachment_12496739\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\">\n <img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604058977.jpg?strip=all&amp;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12496739\" width=\"960\" height=\"540\" />\n <figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption>\n <figcredit>\n  Amazon\n </figcredit>\n</figure>It lets you play music through your car’s speakers[/caption] \n<p>Or you can ask Alexa to put on one of your radio stations.</p> \n<p>The Echo Auto is just a slim back box that can easily attach to your car and fit in with your current data plan.</p> \n<p>However, users have said it works best with an unlimited data plan or it might cost you a bit more than you were expecting.</p> \n<script type=\"application/javascript\" src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/pollingwidgets/v3/widget.js?question_id=2883&amp;game=polling\"></script> \n<p>The device is designed to hear your commands over things like air conditioning and road noise.</p> \n<p>One reviewer wrote: “I have an older sports car with no Bluetooth connection to the radio tuner/CD and thought I would give this a go. </p> \n<p>“Honestly is great. I connect to car via jack socket and its like having a full blown Echo in the car.</p> \n<p>“Music plays seamlessly through the car speakers and I can even switch on the lights and heating in the house from this device prior to getting home.”</p> \n<div class=\"article-boxout\"> \n <div class=\"article-boxout__header theme__background-color\"> \n  <h3 class=\"article-boxout__headline\">What is Alexa?</h3> \n </div> \n <div class=\"article-boxout__content theme__background-color-rgba-20\"> \n  <p class=\"article__content--intro\"> If you've never heard of Alexa, here's what you need to know... </p>  \n  <ul> \n   <li>Alexa is an “intelligent” personal assistant built by Amazon.</li> \n   <li>You can find her on several different devices, including Amazon’s Echo speakers.</li> \n   <li>Alexa responds to voice commands, and can talk back to you.</li> \n   <li>She can perform thousands of different tasks, including telling you about the news or weather.</li> \n   <li>But she can do more complex things too, like ordering a pizza or arranging an Uber taxi pick-up.</li> \n   <li>To activate Alexa, you need to say “Alexa” to an Amazon Echo speaker.</li> \n   <li>Alexa currently only works in English and German languages.</li> \n   <li>Because she’s powered by artificial intelligence, Alexa is constantly getting smarter.</li> \n   <li>Alexa will also get more used to your voice, and better understand what you want her to do over time.</li> \n  </ul> \n </div> \n</div> \n<!-- Start of Brightcove Player --> \n<div style=\"display: block; position: relative; min-width: speaker-clock</a> by nearly half.</p> \n<p>Do you have an Echo smart speaker? 38-year-old toyboy on social media as she defends age-gap love.</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<p>Speaking on <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/loose-women/\">Loose Women</a>, the TV personality said that it was &#8220;nice to have a bit of a flirt&#8221; with a younger man. </p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496517\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 625px\"><img media</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>Coleen initially said that she had a problem with younger guys as she could not understand why they wanted to be with a 55 year old.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;Is it because I&#8217;m on the tele, or they think I&#8217;m rich &#8211; why would you do that when you&#8217;re that young,&#8221; she asked her fellow panellists.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12301468/nolan-sisters-linda-cancer-battle/\">The former singer</a> then said that she had actually been speaking to a &#8220;certain gentlemen on social media&#8221; who was 38, but whom she also happened to quite like.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>She said: &#8220;With other guys I have spoken to of the same age, instantly I would say no you&#8217;re too young &#8211; but this guy is that age but with an older soul.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496571\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 715px\"><img struggles to &#8216;connect personally with someone&#8217; on dating apps[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;You need to connect personally with someone &#8211; the problem is on dating websites you don&#8217;t really get that chance.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>After the other panellists began began discussing whether a toyboy was acceptable, Coleen became more evasive. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>She claimed the man in question was really  just &#8220;a friend&#8221; and &#8220;a really nice guy&#8221; &#8211;  before afterwards joking that she &#8220;might be married&#8221; by next week.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The light-hearted exchange about Coleen&#8217;s dating life comes amidst <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12433648/loose-women-coleen-nolan-denise-welch/\">ongoing tensions</a> between the 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Have Lori Harvey and Future split?","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/tvandshowbiz/12495506/lori-harvey-and-future-split-instagram-rumours-deleted-pictures/","description":"<p>GRAMMY award-winning rapper Future and Lori Harvey have fueled rumors that they have split. </p>\n<p>The pair have only been openly dating since January 2020, but <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/1348399/rapper-future-lori-harvey-rumored-breakup/\">their social medias indicate that their romance has come to an end.</a></p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12495496\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 640px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000533713692.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=630\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495496\" width=\"630\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty - Contributor</figcredit></figure>Grammy award winner Future and Lori Harvey have fueled rumors that they have split[/caption]</p>\n<h2>Have Lori Harvey and Future split? </h2>\n<p>Future and Lori Harvey are fueling breakup rumors after they unfollowed each other on Instagram.</p>\n<p>The pair have even deleted photos of each other from their profiles.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12495498\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000561295781-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495498\" width=\"960\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>The pair have even deleted photos of each other from their profiles[/caption]</p>\n<p>The last time the two were even spotted together was during early lockdown as they posted Instagram Stories of the other while watching YouTube videos.</p>\n<p>Fans have speculated that the drama surrounding Future&#8217;s paternity of <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/816863/future-father-model-eliza-reign-daughter-dna-test/\">model Eliza Reign’s 1-year-old daughter</a> may have got to Lori.</p>\n<p>Last year, Eliza had sued Future for &#8220;paternity, child support and custody.&#8221;</p>\n<p>She accused him of being the father and demanded temporary custody of their daughter.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12495500\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 515px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000575327180-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=505\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495500\" width=\"505\" height=\"507\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Refer to Caption</figcredit></figure>The last time the two were even spotted together was during early lockdown[/caption]</p>\n<h2>When did the pair start dating?</h2>\n<p>Future and Lori Harvey first began sharing their relationship on social media in January 2020.</p>\n<p>However, the pair had been spotted spending time together at the end of 2019, so it seems they may have been dating before that. </p>\n<p>The two had been quarantined together during lockdown.</p>\n<p>Future and Lori have never made it official, but they act like a couple on social media.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12495502\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 649px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000575326943.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=639\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495502\" width=\"639\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Fans have speculated that the drama surrounding Future&#8217;s paternity of model Eliza Reign’s 1-year-old daughter may have got to Lori[/caption]</p>\n<p>However, since the beginning of lockdown, they have not appeared on each others&#8217; social media.</p>\n<p>In the past, Future has spoken out about keeping his love life private: &#8220;It&#8217;s just, you know, what to give and you know what not to put out or whatever it is.</p>\n<p>&#8220;You still try and find those different ways to keep it private but some way to give your fans little insights into what is going on in your life,</p>\n<p>&#8220;You get the people in the world who want to know, so you open up a little bit, but you got to save majority for yourself and your partner.&#8221;</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12495503\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 780px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602746937.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=770\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495503\" width=\"770\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>Future has spoken out about keeping his love life private[/caption]</p>\n<h2>Do the couple have any children?</h2>\n<p>No, Future and Lori do not have any children together. However,  they <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/640886/lori-harvey-pregnancy-rumors/\">ignited pregnancy rumors</a>&#160;in April when fans spotted a sonogram picture on social media while they hung out together.</p>\n<p>On his own, <a href=\"https://www.the-sun.com/entertainment/817177/rapper-future-kids-how-many/\">Future currently has eight children</a>, his eldest being son Jakobi.</p>\n<p>He was engaged to Ciara in October 2013, and the pair had a son on May 19, 2014, who they named Future Zahir Wilburn.</p>\n<p><figure id=\"attachment_12495505\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 649px\"><img src=\"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000575326943-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=639\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495505\" width=\"639\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>NINTCHDBPICT000575326943-1[/caption]</p>\n<p>\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row -->\n\t<!--googleon: all-->\n\t</p>\n<p>He has two other sons, Prince and Hendrix.</p>\n<p>He also has a daughter named Londyn.</p>\n<p>Future has two other children &#8211; Kash and Paris &#8211; with unknown mothers.</p>\n<div></div>\n","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 25 Aug 2020 14:33:17 +0000","feedId":10019,"bgimg":"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000533713692.jpg?strip=all&w=630","linkMd5":"c73b135ebe667cb36d8f23badd0cb84d","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn44@2020_5/2020/08/25/16-46-56-980_a5c2ee3f7537bd90.webp","destWidth":630,"destHeight":961,"sourceBytes":211084,"destBytes":211084,"author":"Clara Gaspar","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000533713692.jpg?strip=all&w=630":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn44@2020_5/2020/08/25/16-46-56-980_a5c2ee3f7537bd90.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000561295781-1.jpg?strip=all&w=960":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn71@2020_2/2020/08/25/16-47-13-551_e439589ea3641966.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000575327180-1.jpg?strip=all&w=505":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn75@2020_6/2020/08/25/16-47-03-767_06f1133eb96d53c5.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000575326943.jpg?strip=all&w=639":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn88@2020_4/2020/08/25/16-47-07-446_c844137fcc464915.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000602746937.jpg?strip=all&w=770":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn55@2020_3/2020/08/25/16-47-09-983_53750cca6b9f8350.webp","https://www.the-sun.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/6/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000575326943-1.jpg?strip=all&w=639":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn48@2020_5/2020/08/25/16-47-08-938_9a26e2353aae46fd.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598374016698},{"createdTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","updatedTime":"2020-08-26 00:46:56","title":"Harry Maguire’s sister ‘fitted and eyes rolled back after being injected with rape drug sparking brawl in Mykonos’","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12492905/harry-maguire-sister-injected-drug-albanians-mykonos-trial-brawl/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>HARRY Maguire&#8217;s sister&#8217;s eyes rolled back in her head and she began fitting after being injected with a &#8220;rape drug&#8221;, a friend of the family told a Greek court today.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Daisy was approached by two Albanians in Mykonos on Thursday as her brother and a group of pals went to get burgers following a night out clubbing.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><strong><img src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/12.0.0-1/72x72/26a0.png\" alt=\"⚠\" class=\"wp-smiley\" style=\"height: 1em; max-height: 1em;\" />Click here for the latest news on <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12492131/harry-maguire-trial-live/\">Harry Maguire</a></strong></p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12470874\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 773px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603434231.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=763\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12470874\" width=\"763\" height=\"778\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram / HarryMaguire</figcredit></figure>Harry Maguire reportedly brawled with a group of Albanians after his sister Daisy was injected[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603457487-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"Maguire was held in a cell for two nights after a brawl in Mykonos\" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">The footballer appeared at court at the weekend</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_undefined\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 10px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000421273847.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=640\" alt=\"Joe Maguire, centre with Harry right and brother Laurence left, has also been charged \" class=\"alignnone\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Brother Joe Maguire &#8211; pictured centre with Harry, right, and brother Laurence left &#8211; has also been charged</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>But Maguire&#8217;s fiancée, Fern Hawkins, soon realised Daisy&#8217;s eyes were &#8220;rolling into the back of her head&#8221; &#8211; so the Man Utd captain and a group of male friends rushed over to help.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Giving evidence at the trial on the neighbouring island of Syros today, friend Ashden Morley said: &#8220;We held Daisy. Daisy began to start fitting. All the girls were screaming.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>“People were coming down asking what happened, there was a large commotion.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<p><strong>What we know so far:</strong></p>\n\n\n\n<ul><li>Harry Maguire <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12492131/harry-maguire-trial-live/\">has gone on trial with brother Joe and pal Chris Sharman  after a brawl in Mykonos on Thursday </a></li><li>The court was told sister <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12492905/harry-maguire-sister-injected-mykonos-albanians-brawl/\">Daisy was injected in the arm by Albanian men, causing her to faint</a></li><li>A police officer was punched and one needed first aid when a scuffle allegedly broke out between officers and the trio</li><li>After being taken to a police station, <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12490898/harry-maguire-mykonos-fight-trial-brother-man-utd/\">Maguire was kicked in the leg by a cop who told him his career was &#8220;over&#8221;, it was said</a></li><li>The court was told <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/12493289/harry-maguire-brother-slams-cop-boast/\">Maguire then tried to pay cops off </a>&#8211; boasting: &#8220;Don&#8217;t you know who I am?&#8221;</li></ul>\n\n\n\n<hr class=\"wp-block-separator\" />\n\n\n\n<p>At this point, a minibus Maguire had booked showed up so the panicked group piled in and told the driver they needed to go to a hospital, it was said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But Mr Morley said they realised two cars were behind them &#8220;following our every movement&#8221; before the vehicle pulled up in a courtyard.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He added: &#8220;Our bus door opened and five or six males tried to force us off the bus by physically pulling us.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The quantity surveyor, 27, told the court how they all feared they would be kidnapped and &#8220;held at ransom&#8221; as they were beaten with batons and kicked and stamped on.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495152\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 638px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604027731.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=628\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495152\" width=\"628\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Nick Obank - The Sun</figcredit></figure>Ashden Morley arrives at court today to give evidence[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495212\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 749px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604005440.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=739\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495212\" width=\"739\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Nick Obank - The Sun</figcredit></figure>He said the group feared they were being kidnapped when allegedly attacked by police[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>One cop then allegedly kicked Maguire on the leg and told him: &#8220;Your career is over&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>With the women “in hysterics crying their eyes out”, the England star, 27, was arrested along with brother Joe and pal Chris.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Mr Morley said: &#8220;This was the first time that we knew we were at the police station.”</p>\n\n\n\n<p>None of the defendants &#8211; including Maguire &#8211; were required in court today with all instead being represented by their legal team.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The court earlier heard how one cop required first aid when handcuffed Maguire attempted to break free &#8211; as another pal yelled &#8220;f**k the police&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>After they were taken inside the station, £190,000-a-week Maguire boasted about how &#8220;rich&#8221; he was as he tried to pay police off, it was said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He allegedly said: &#8220;Do you know who I am? I am the captain of Manchester United, I am very rich, I can give you money, I can pay you, please let us go.”</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490987\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 365px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603970086.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=355\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490987\" width=\"355\" height=\"406\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Instagram</figcredit></figure>Chris Sharman &#8211; left, with Joe, right and Laurence Maguire, centre &#8211; is also going on trial[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The claims were made today as <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/football/12493424/england-squad-maguire-southgate-sterling/\">Maguire was named in Gareth Southgate&#8217;s England squad for the upcoming Nations League games, despite fears he would miss out.</a></p>\n\n\n\n<p>Maguire&#8217;s top human rights lawyer Alexis Anagnostakis earlier tried three times to postpone the case but the judge dismissed his protests.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Once it finally got underway, he told the trial how the defender was &#8220;attacked by an Albanian group&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>It was then claimed there is video shot from outside <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/mykonos/\">Mykonos </a>police station showing how the police &#8220;mistreated&#8221; them.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The footage also shows them in a state of &#8220;extreme agony&#8221;, Mr Anagnostakis said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The lawyer added: &#8220;My clients did not beat anyone, accost anyone, or injure anyone.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492021\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604007449.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492021\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Nick Obank - The Sun</figcredit></figure>Harry&#8217;s dad Alan is in court in Syros today[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>All three defendants are charged with assault and violence against an officer.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The brothers are further charged with attempted bribery, while Maguire and Chris are accused of verbal assault.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The bribery charges carry a maximum sentence of up to five years in jail and a fine.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>But the group are able to appeal the decision in a higher court if they are found guilty today.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12486846\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603822108.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12486846\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Splash News</figcredit></figure>Daisy Maguire was seen back in the UK on Monday [/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12486838\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 417px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603824910.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=407\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12486838\" width=\"407\" height=\"400\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Splash News</figcredit></figure>She was reportedly stabbed in the arm [/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12464482\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 551px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603268522.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=541\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12464482\" width=\"541\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">Daisy had posted a video of the star hours before the drama at Bonbonniere bar</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12464483\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 551px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603268519.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=541\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12464483\" width=\"541\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\">It was uploaded 18 hours before the bust-up</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<p>He spent two nights in a cell with Joe and Chris before appearing before a court on Saturday in Syros.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Maguire is now understood to have travelled back to the UK.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>His sister Daisy was yesterday pictured arriving back in England wheeling a suitcase.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Brother Laurence Maguire was also pictured at the home in England as his brothers Harry and Joe await their fate in a Greek court.</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row \">\n\t\t<div class=\"col sun-col-6\">\n\n\t\t\t<div Young&#8217;s departure to Inter Milan.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>He is next due to play at Old Trafford for their first game of the season on September 19 against Crystal Palace.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure winds","link":"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12487369/uk-weather-today-storm-francis-met-office/","description":"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<p>THERE are grave fears for two people missing in a rising river today as Storm Francis batters Britain with record-breaking 74mph winds.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A 700 mile-wide &#8216;Canadian low pressure vortex’ is bringing wild gusts, heavy downpours and some of the worst summer <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/topic/weather/\">weather</a> for 50 years.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12496192\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img Wales[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491740\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img Glamorgan[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491924\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img in Sunderland[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492841\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img Wales[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491927\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 814px\"><img height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>London News Pictures</figcredit></figure>Commuters on their way in to work get caught in heavy rain in Fulham Broadway in South West London[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491945\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 490px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603986825.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=480\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491945\" width=\"480\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Twitter / Transport for Wales</figcredit></figure>Flooding on train lines between Mountain Ash and Aberdare in South Wales[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491218\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603973691.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491218\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Getty Images - Getty</figcredit></figure>A view of the 18th green and the clubhouse as play is suspended due to flooding at The Amateur Championship at Royal Birkdale in Southport[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>A desperate search is underway for two people who have been missing for hours in the River Taff north of Cardiff, Wales.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Emergency services were searching the river after reports of a person entering the water near Principality Stadium at 8.40am, while a member of the public reported seeing a canoeist capsize around 9.50 this morning.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Air ambulance and hazardous rescue teams are frantically searching for the pair as the public is warned to stay away from the area.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Meanwhile in the River Ely nearby in Leckwith, Cardiff, a woman had to be rescued after she chased after her dog into the water.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Both her and her pet were rescued by a lifeboat, and although they were &#8220;obviously cold and wet both appeared in good spirits and were taken for medical checks&#8221;, the Penarth Lifeboat Station posted on Facebook.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A number of places in England and Wales have recorded their highest-ever winds in August.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Met Office said winds of 74mph have been recorded at Lake Vyrnwy in Powys, Wales &#8211; the highest in August there since 1994.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Aberdaron in the Welsh county of Gwynedd has recorded gusts of 71mph, the highest since 1996.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Gusts of 68mph were recorded at Pembrey Sands, 52mph was recorded at Shobdon in Herefordshire, and 49mph was recorded at Pershore in Worcestershire.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Storm Francis was upgraded to an Amber Weather Warning this afternoon, with the Met Service saying that a danger to life was &#8220;likely&#8221;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Forecasters are predicting heavy rainfall &#8211; up to 3.5 inches in places &#8211; during a 36-hour weather window.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>More than 500 homes are without power in Gloucestershire this afternoon due to the high winds.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>There are reports of more than 40 trees down across the county,</p>\n\n\n\n<p>There were also power cuts to more than 120 homes in the West Country by 6am this morning.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Dozens of villages in Devon and Cornwall have been warned that 90mm of rain could fall during the storm.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Cops said roads could turn into &#8220;lakes&#8221; and have warned drivers to take care behind the wheel.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495961\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604044932.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495961\" width=\"960\" height=\"585\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Bournemouth News</figcredit></figure>A huge wave crashes through Durdle Door in Dorset[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495969\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604042396.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495969\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>©Graham Hunt</figcredit></figure>People stand and watch as huge waves crash ashore at Chesil Cove on the Isle of Portland in Dorset[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490935\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603955184-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490935\" width=\"960\" height=\"643\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Twitter</figcredit></figure>A car stranded due to rainfall during Storm Francis in London[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12487999\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603845312-1.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12487999\" width=\"960\" height=\"703\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"> Satellite images show the 700 mile-wide Storm Francis&#8217; &#8216;Canadian low pressure vortex&#8217;</figcaption><figcredit></figcredit></figure>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495113\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604034425.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495113\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Duncan McGlynn</figcredit></figure>People endure heavy rain on the Royal Mile in Edinburgh, Scotland[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495114\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604034427.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495114\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Duncan McGlynn</figcredit></figure>A woman tries to save her umbrella on the Royal Mile in Edinburgh, Scotland[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495112\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604033197.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495112\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alamy Live News</figcredit></figure>Storm Francis winds at Bournemouth, Dorset[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495115\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604029456.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495115\" width=\"960\" height=\"634\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Reuters</figcredit></figure>A truck drives through a flooded road near Tenby, in Pembrokeshire, Britain[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12495111\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 715px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604031372.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=705\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12495111\" width=\"705\" height=\"683\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alistair Grant Freelance / NASA</figcredit></figure>Britain is invisible as satellite images show 700 mile-wide Storm Francis&#8217; &#8216;Canadian low pressure vortex[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>Homes have flooded and a group of campers have been stranded in Wales.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Firefighters rescued the campers who are close to &#8220;fast-flowing water&#8221; in Carmarthenshire, the BBC reported.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Met Office has warned that people could be hurt by &#8220;flying debris&#8221;, while large waves could threaten lives.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>According to the Met Office, gusts of 67mph were recorded at the Isles of Scilly between 8am and 9am on Tuesday morning, while they reached 73mph at the Needles on the Isle of Wight in the same period.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>An Environment Agency recording taken between 11pm on Monday and 7am on Tuesday logged 65.8mm dropping at White Barrow in Devon.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In the same period, Natural Resources Wales recorded 61.4mm falling at Tavernspite in Carmarthenshire, Wales, while Spite in Glamorganshire saw 56.2mm.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Three Met Office yellow weather warnings of heavy rain or strong winds cover most of the UK on Tuesday, with stormy conditions expected to last until Wednesday morning.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Warnings of rain cover Northern Ireland, southern Scotland, northern England and parts of North Wales.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Forecasters predict gusts of up to 70mph could batter exposed coasts and hills across Wales and most of England.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The M48 bridge across the River Severn has been closed in both directions due to the increased wind speeds.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The Highways Agency reported a fallen tree temporarily blocking the A30 in Cornwall, while another toppled tree brought disruption by blocking the rail line between Gunnislake in Cornwall and Plymouth in Devon, before being cleared.</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>LINES CLOSED</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>At Neath in South Wales, flooding caused lines to be closed for part of the morning, with knock-on delays of up to 60 minutes.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Flooding on the line between Fernhill and Aberdare, also in South Wales, triggered a suspension to services.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In Northern Ireland, police reported an incident of a river bursting its banks near Newcastle, as well as roads blocked by flooding, a fallen tree and downed power line.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>As of midday on Tuesday, the Environment Agency has issued 22 flood alerts for England, largely in the South West and West Midlands.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>In Burnham-on-Sea, an ice cream van got stuck on the beach yesterday afternoon.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>As a few hardy souls ventured out on to the beach in the break in the awful weather, the ice cream driver saw the chance for some Cornetto sales.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Staycationer holidaymakers gratefully queued to buy &#8211; but in his eagerness he ventured too far on to the sands and began sinking.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A team from the local BARB Search and Rescue, who operate hovercrafts in the Bridgwater Bay area, were called out.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12493173\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/60a4b3b3-845b-40a5-9d24-58973c36ed16.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12493173\" width=\"960\" height=\"727\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>North News and Pictures</figcredit></figure>The weather conditions worsen in Seaham, County Durham[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492955\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 718px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604016326.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=708\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492955\" width=\"708\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>PA:Press Association</figcredit></figure>Flooding on New Street, Bantry in West Cork on Monday night[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492462\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604011647.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492462\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Athena Picture Agency</figcredit></figure>A stranded caravan at Lakeside campsite near St Clears in west Wales[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492461\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604011283.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492461\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Athena Picture Agency</figcredit></figure>Tents and cars have been stranded at Lakeside campsite[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492175\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604007611.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492175\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Alamy Live News</figcredit></figure>A woman with long hair struggles to walk along the seafront in the strong gusty winds from Storm Francis at the seaside resort of West Bay in Dorset[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492193\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000604008950.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492193\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Apex News</figcredit></figure>Storm Francis batters the Cornish coast at Porthleven[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The ice cream van&#8217;s wheels had sunk into the soft sand near the jetty following heavy rain.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The coastguard alerted the rescue organisation who managed to pull the bright yellow vehicle free using a truck.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Millionaire homeowners on Sandbanks have had their sea views blighted by a huge oil platform seeking shelter from Storm Francis.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The JB-115 self-elevating platform has stopped in Poole Harbour, Dorset, to take shelter from the elements and is currently sitting in the shadow of the exclusive peninsula.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Storm Francis is expected to batter Dorset today with heavy rain and strong winds of up to 60mph.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Once the storm has passed the platform, which is used for wind farm and oil rig maintenance, will continue on its journey to Morecambe Field in the Irish Sea.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The status of the platform, which measures 182ft by 105ft with 262ft long legs, is currently listed as &#8216;restricted manoeuvrability&#8217;.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Meanwhile, Drivers in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/london/\">London</a> were forced to negotiate torrents of water on the road as Storm Francis arrived with avengence in the early evening on Monday.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Eight flood alerts are already in place in <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/england/\">England</a> and <a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/where/wales/\">Wales</a> and ten in Scotland.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Shredded tents, blackouts and travel problems from toppled trees and floods are risks as millions are on UK breaks away from home, amid wind gusts usually seen in winter.</p>\n\n\n\n<h2>FLOOD ALERTS</h2>\n\n\n\n<p>The Met Office has issued a new wind warning for all of Wales and most of England until Wednesday, as well as two heavy rain warnings for southern Scotland, north Wales and northern England.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Chief Meteorologist Andy Page said: &#8220;The UK is in for another unseasonably wet and windy spell with Storm Francis arriving on Tuesday.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;There will be strong winds and heavy rain, especially in the west of the UK.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Conditions on roads around Wales were difficult on Tuesday morning<br>with flooding already reported in Skewen.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Police said that water in Bryntirion, Bridgend, is knee deep.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>The train line between Neath and Cardiff has also been flooded with a<br>warning of wide-scale disruption on train services in the area, and a<br>fallen tree has blocked the rail line between Caerphilly and Rhymney.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>A car was stranded in flooding at the a bridge in the Vale of Glamorgan.</p>\n\n\n\n<p><a href=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/12487369/uk-weather-tomorrow-storm-francis/?preview_id=12487369&#38;preview_nonce=6b8f7e629a&#38;preview=true\">Storm Francis</a> is expected to clear by Wednesday lunchtime, leaving a brighter and more settled outlook for the remainder of the day, the Met Office said.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>After Francis&#8217; two-day buffeting, more wet and windy conditions follow from Thursday into the Bank Holiday weekend, when the Met Office is even forecasting summer frost, most likely in the North.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12492216\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 810px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603999248.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=800\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12492216\" width=\"800\" height=\"960\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>London News Pictures</figcredit></figure>Commuters on their way in to work get caught in the rain at Fulham Broadway[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12490932\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603966533.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12490932\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>Mercury Press</figcredit></figure>A woman fixes her umbrella during the heavy rain in Liverpool city centre this morning[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12489941\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603883978.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12489941\" width=\"960\" height=\"676\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>London News Pictures</figcredit></figure>Commuters get caught in torrential rain in Putney in South West London[/caption]\n\n\n\n<figure id=\"attachment_12491371\" class=\"wp-caption alignnone\" style=\"width: 970px\"><img src=\"https://www.thesun.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/NINTCHDBPICT000603986186.jpg?strip=all&#38;w=960\" alt=\"\" class=\"alignnone size-thesun-article-image wp-image-12491371\" width=\"960\" height=\"640\" /><figcaption class=\"wp-caption-text\"></figcaption><figcredit>GEOFF ROBINSON.</figcredit></figure>Driving conditions were treacherous on the A14 near Cambridge on Tuesday morning[/caption]\n\n\n\n<p>The arrival of Storm Francis follows a similar period of unseasonable weather towards the end of last week, coinciding with the arrival of Storm Ellen.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Nicola Williams, 15, was swept to her death in the Rhymney River in Llanrumney, Cardiff, and a 50-year-old holidaymaker die in the sea near Helston, west Cornwall, after getting into difficulties.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Nicola Maxey of the Met Office said: &#8220;Since 2015 when we started naming storms, we have never had to name a storm in August &#8211; and now we&#8217;ve had two in a few days.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>&#8220;There are a lot of people on holiday in the UK at the moment, going camping and on walking breaks, many in coastal locations where the winds are likely to be stronger, so it is worth checking on the Met Office website ahead of time.&#8221;</p>\n\n\n\n\t<!--googleoff: all-->\n\t\t<div class=\"sun-grid-container sun-grid-container--white\">\n\t\n\t<div class=\"sun-row &#8220;unusual&#8221; for August, but would have to go some way to beat the current record wind gust speed of 87mph recorded at The Needles on the Isle of Wight in August 1996.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Likewise, the wettest August on record in the UK was in 1912 when 167.3 mm was recorded across the country as a whole.</p>\n\n\n\n<p>Between August 1 and 22, the UK as a whole had seen some 72.7mm of rainfall Stuttgart winger Nicolas Gonzalez. </p>\n\n\n\n<p>But the Whites look set to miss out on the Argentine after comments from Stuttgart sporting director Sven Mislintat.</p>\n\n\n\n<figure
